Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pankaj Ghosh
Detailed Review: Recently was on a visit to Mumbai and was looking for a place close to the Chatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus. This hotel is literally at 5 mins walking distance from the Railway station(From Platform 1,2,3,4.. side). The room and the bathroom was tidy and clean. Staff were courteous and helpful. There are 2 restaurants and 1 bar on the ground floor. Close to the Gateway of India (3.5 Km or 10 mins by Taxi) and around 40 mins from the Siddhivinayaka temple. 30 mins to Mahalaxmi temple. 20 Mins walk to the Marine drive.  Just that rooms are way too small for 2 people. Sufficient for one person.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Denisa C
Review: Great hotel, amazing staff, must come here in Mumbai
Detailed Review: Best staff I have met, very professional and friendly, always trying to help you with anything you need.  Location close to all major tourist attractions, and in a very nice area (clean & safe) with many restaurants and shops.  Good breakfast, room was comfortable & clean. The front desk manager told us about a day tour, I highly recommend it, because it was very very good. Covered important locations, the tour guide (Ban) was amazing, explained everything very well in great english. The price was also excellent.   All in all, great place, the best hotel I’ve seen in Mumbai at an affordable price. Definitely the greatest staff, 11/10!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Danyy D
Detailed Review: The staff was the best! The room was clean all the time. The breakfast was varied. There is a timeless cafe where u can stay and enjoy a good coffee or a tea. The room was big. You have a lot of things to do around the hotel. Many restaurants with great food. I recommend with all my heart!!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dominik
Detailed Review: Stay in Hotel residency fort was excellent! The staff was so kind to us and did everything to make our stay as nice as possible. When we asked for something, in second, it was solved and prepared for us. Expecially in city like Mumbai, its nice to have some kind of certainty, which this hotel totally provided for us!  Special thanks to: Patil and Gopal

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Medha M
Review: Very pleasant stay and very generous hospitality
Detailed Review: I stayed at this hotel which is right in the fort area near CST, for 7 days.   In midst of the hustle bustle of South Bombay we fortunately found this place which was economic, serene and decent. The decor have me the Mumbai vibes and the street food nearby just added to the Bombay flavour. Yaazdani bakery, in the neighborhood has the best bun maska and mava cakes. Mahish lunch home and a few more restaurants serve quite a few variety of fish.  The staff is very cooperative and guests get quick service delivery.  Overall, a very pleasant experience - decent room and facilities, amicable staff and good quality spread in the breakfast buffet.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: amybK7437JN
Review: Beautiful Hotel in a Great Location
Detailed Review: Our stay at the Residency was fantastic thanks to Gopel who was professional and went out of his way to make sure we were comfortable and had everything we need.   Clean rooms, good buffet breakfast and a great location - we loved it here!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Caz
Review: Wonderful stay in a good location
Detailed Review: We arrived very early from an overnight train and right from entering the hotel, we had an excellent experience. We were greeted in a very friendly way by the reception staff and offered snacks and drinks, most appreciated. We were also given a room straight away despite the early hour so were able to get a few hours’ sleep after a hot shower. All the staff were friendly, polite and courteous and spoke good English. Breakfast was varied and delicious and served over a wide range of hours to suit both early and late risers. We were also able to store our luggage after check out. Despite the fact that the rooms would benefit from some maintenance, our Club room had everything we needed - kettle, fridge, good AC and a comfortable bed. I have no hesitation in recommending this hotel. We’ve had 4 fantastic weeks in India and this has been one of the best we’ve stayed in. Also good access to CSMT and Churcghate stations.…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Monika
Detailed Review: Good staff good hotel roshan sir n petter sir was very nice please visit here yaha se market pass mai hai yaha ka food bhi bahut acha hai sub se acha yaha par ap ko sari facilities milengi yaha se ap ko Mumbai darshan karvane ke liye taxi bhi book karva denge

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Yoram H
Detailed Review: Because of our delayed flight, we arrived a day later and got a free upgrade to a larger beautiful room! Breakfast was extensive and tasted well. Also the hotel iswell priced for the location in Mumbai.  Service from all staff was excellent. Concierge Rajesh helped us to get some basic stuff from the stores nearby, like an umbrella and sim-cards.   In short, definitely a good place to stay when visiting Mumbai!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Bolyki G
Review: Come as a guest and go as a friend
Detailed Review: Superb quality hotel, should be rated over 3 stars! The staff is very welcoming and they help you with anything. I have had issues in India, nothing major and the hotel helped me solve out everything. Clean, tidy, organized. 10/10

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Swapnil
Detailed Review: Stay at Residency  hotel fort was good. Late check in without any hussle,lip smacking and varied kind in complementary breakfast and awesome housekeeping service.Concierge Mr Rajesh was very helping and kind to us.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anindita
Detailed Review: More than the hotel by itself, have to say the staff was very very courteous .....great customer service!!   Right from the receptionist to the restaurant staff, everybody made sure we were extremely comfortable.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Omar S
Detailed Review: The best staff you can fond all over mumbai, Peter our restaurant host was very friendly and welcoming, also on the reception desk people are friendly and fullfill all your requests very fast. Would totally come again when i visit mumbai

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kailash Pohnerkar
Detailed Review: One of the best hotel if you a want a decent budget hotel near T2 International Airport. I stayed for a night and I liked it. They do have buffet dinner at 500 rupees per person and buffet breakfast. Food was fresh and good. They are provide Airport transfer (pickup & drop off)  for additional cost but I think its awesome service if you want piece of mind when heading towards airport. Overall I think is a good hotel for one night.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: periaswamy
Review: Excellent Hotel - Worth for Money and Value
Detailed Review: Hotel is located on the road which makes it very easy to commute. Rooms are clean but a bit small as compared to the tariff taken. In-room amenities are also limited but one can get them if needed from the reception. Food was good but the spread of buffet can be improved. Overall it's a good experience.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Parminder
Detailed Review: As soon as we reached at the hotel entrance we were shocked with the entrance, we were thinking to cancel our booking and book somewhere else but we decided to go up and have a look as soon as we went upstairs our opinion totally changed, we felt like in a decent place the receptionist i don't remember his name was so kind and helpful. We were served bottles of water at the arrival. The rooms are small but if you are in Bombay for travelling it shouldn't matter. The hotel doesn't have laundry service but still they arranged it for us. We were served everyday breakfast completely free. Which is really nice to start your day with. Hotel has small team but they handle every issue within seconds. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Máté P
Detailed Review: The staff was very helpful and flexible - brought room service from neighboring restaurants, turned off the noisy mini-fridge, and let us stay in their lounge with free water and chai even hours after our checkout. I especially appreciate the help from Gopal, who always looked out for us. Even though the staff and location were perfect and the room comfortable, the wifi was pretty slow and it was unclear if the towels were unchanged or they were just old. However, we had our own towels so it didn't bother us at all and the staff's professionalism completely offset this.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Suus
Review: Comfortable hotel in great location with super friendly staff
Detailed Review: The location of this hotel is great! Near two railway stations, Marine Drive and lots of restaurants and shops to choose from. Except for a few Club Rooms in the attached building, rooms ar small but comfortable. Everything you need is there and the beds are comfy too. Breakfast is superb with a large variety of freshly prepared food items and good coffee. But what makes your stay memorable, is the super friendly and helpful staff!! Peter, Roshan, Gopal and Akmol, just to name a few, always seem to be cheerful and make you smile every time you enter the reception or breakfast hall. Also help with SIM card, storing luggage for a month, nothing is a problem. During our second stay that month we had a fabulous and spacious room in the attached building, but despite the comfort we…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Delila1984
Detailed Review: Excellent stay at this nice hotel. Ideal location,: in the center of Mumbai, yet calm. Extremely attentive, efficient and cordial staff. Always ready to help the client and  give good advice or useful contact if needed.  Rooms are comfortable and  breakfast simply royal (Indian and Western-style).   A truly friendly atmosphere is something you need when you come for the first time to the sprawling Mumbai. I can only wholeheartedly recommend Residency, Fort, Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kaloyan S
Detailed Review: Great hotel with great location and great staff. The people that work there are always ready to help you with everything and to arrange you everything that you need. Clean air conditioned rooms, nice and fresh breakfast. The hotel is definitely worth it.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Bharath R
Detailed Review: The hotel is top notch.  It lives up to the standards, be it maintainance wise, cleanliness and service.  The service is excellent, the staff is very friendly and courteous , Mr.Kesar was extremely helpful. It was lovely staying at The Residency Fort, and we look forward to staying here when we visit Mumbai next.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: abazanin
Detailed Review: Amazing hotel in a brilliant location even despite nearby construction site. Gentlemen working in the hotel are super friendly and helpful. Special thanks to the reception team and Gopal. I would definitely recommend that place to stay

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shreeya Agarwal
Detailed Review: Literally everything about the hotel was so so good, the staff is very polite the breakfast was amazing and all the facilities available, cleanliness, helping out with the baggage‼️ overall satisfied.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Josie C
Detailed Review: We had a really wonderful stay here! The new rooms are beautiful and the complimentary breakfast was delicious. The staff could not have been more responsive, helpful and kind. We had a problem with our booked train and the receptionist spent about an hour with us ringing people up and helping us consider our options. Really brilliant above and beyond service. Thank you so much!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Amar
Review: This hotel is the definition of hospitality!!!
Detailed Review: Stayed here for a few days while visiting south Bombay for work and had zero complains!! The staff was beyond lovely I wish I remembered their names (gopal, rajesh, and a few others) but every individual there was on point. Will definitely be staying here again and highly recommend anyone needing a hotel in this area to give them a shot. Anything you may need during your stay they will figure something out for you.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Daniel2color
Review: Wonderful cosy and clean refuge from the hectic city life
Detailed Review: I had a really pleasant stay at the Residency Hotel Fort where I spent my last days of a long trip in India.  From the moment I arrived I was warmly welcomed with a cold drink and a snack. The staff were extremely friendly and helped with every question and request I had.  The room was clean and cosy with blackout curtains and air conditioning and attention to detail.  Since my flight was after midnight the day following my stay, the hotel staff offered to look after my luggage during the day and even shower in the evening before traveling to the airport.   Residency Hotel became my home in Mumbai and I’ll definitely be coming back.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Amy R
Detailed Review: We really enjoyed our stay at the Residency Hotel Fort, it was conveniently located for the old town, comfortable and clean. The breakfast was great, so much choice. The staff were very friendly and welcoming, in particular Ghopal who helped us find a SIM and made us v welcome. Thank you!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jay
Review: Well designed compact rooms - super friendly staff
Detailed Review: Great hotel for a quick business trip in south Mumbai. The rooms will be on the smaller side (you really can’t expect more in a city of 20+ million) but they’ve done a good job with the space given - every sqft is well utilized.   Location is perfect for walking around - marine drive is about 30m brisk.   Can’t say enough good things about the staff. Super friendly and considerate: I was figuring out train tickets, tatkal, etc and you could tell they really wanted help.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shreyas Rao
Review: The best hospitality and hotel staff
Detailed Review: This was my first time visiting Mumbai and we'd come for a short weekend getaway and also to watch an IPL game at Wankhede stadium. My overnight bus reached the city very early in the morning and so I made my way over to the hotel where I was made to feel so welcome by the staff.  Despite my early arrival they made arrangements for me to freshen up in he lounge and offered a complimentary beverage (tea/coffee) and also a complimentary breakfast which has a delicious spread.  The rooms are very luxurious and have everything you would need. Room service is prompt and polite.  While mine was a short trip, I can safely say that I received one of the best hospitality ever and would absolutely recommend this hotel to anyone coming to Mumbai.  A special mention to Mr Rajesh ji who was…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dash
Review: Staff very accommodating. Rooms probably need an upgrade
Detailed Review: Stayed here for 2 nights. All staff were very warm and accommodating. They went out of their way to attend to my needs. Gopal especially helped  to get me a local SIM as I came from abroad.  As much as the staff were great, the rooms seem a little run down. For the cost per room, you would expect a higher standard in the rooms.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Narayanan Subramaniam
Detailed Review: This is a small hotel in Dadar, Mumbai. The best part about it is the location. It is accessible from any part of the city or suburbs. It is walking distance from the Dadar train station. The tariff is also moderate. There are many restaurants and bars nearby.   It is clean and well kept. The rooms are adequate for a business traveler. Wi-fi is decent, and breakfast is served in the room. Taxis are available just outside. If you are looking for a convenient place to stay during a business trip, then this place is highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Hus L
Review: Absolutely abysmal hotel. Super shady and expect police raids. Manager was incredibly rude
Detailed Review: ABSOLUTELY ABYSMAL EXPERIENCE- PLEASE READ BEFORE BOOKING.  First off, this is a hotel masquerading as a heritage style hotel, but in reality it’s just one shady hallway in a building that is in shambles. Even if it seems like a value for money place in a nice location, the rooms in fact have no windows and just the experience of entering the building will turn you off.  Now here’s what happened: We were a group visiting for a wedding. We had booked 3 rooms and were 3 married couples and one single. While booking we informed Mr. Sunil about the people coming, and he said it shouldn’t be a problem as long we had our IDs. Once there they asked us not only for our IDs but also for proof of marriage. They told us that Unmarried couples are not allowed and when we told him we would split the rooms with boys and girls in separate rooms, he said that we would not be allowed to go into each other’s rooms. When we showed them a marriage certificate- they asked for Family photos from the wedding! Since we were really looking to freshen up and head to the wedding events, we showed some photos. Then he asked us to email those private photos as evidence. This is the most ludicrous and backward thing I have ever heard. Why should I share family photos of my wedding with a shady hotel for their record, after we provided them evidence. When we objected about this, they told us that if there was a raid they’d need proof. NO DECENT HOTEL EXPECTS RAIDS. THIS IS CLEARLY NOT A DECENT HOTEL. NO HOTEL ASKS FOR PRIVATE PHOTOS. The desk staff escalated the matter to a Mr. Hemant over the phone who was incredibly rude. How this man is pursuing a career in hospitality is truly shocking! He spoke to us like he was a bouncer denying us entry in some exclusive club. He told us WE HAD TO send him wedding photos and that if we didn’t we would not be given a room. He said you are free to leave. Absolutely bizarre and harrowing experience. This decrepit place does not deserve self-respecting clientele. PLEASE FIND ANOTHER OPTION. You will find several more- it’s mumbai and there are options by the dozen. We got another hotel at the same rate with much better rooms and service who did not ask for anything other than our ID proof.  PLEASE DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AN DO NOT BOOK HERE.…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: TommyO1955
Detailed Review: When I am in Mumbai, I stay at the Residency, in Fort. The facility is fine, well kept and clean as a whistle. The location is in vibrant Fort....real Mumbai, with all the restaurants and shops, the hustle and bustle, that make a neighborhood hip. Proximity to Colaba and Churchgate, Marine Drive, any service you may need, (get a shave and a haircut, get laundry expertly done at the Churchill scholar's shop, both next door). The breakfast buffet is top notch, with a nice mix of western and Indian choices. And a cappuccino machine! Restaurants like The Fountain and Taste of Kerala are not tourist places, rather they are the choice of locals like the advocates after the work day. Crawford Market, a shopping experience like no other is a 20 minute walk away (not for the frail)  But…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rishabh381
Review: Great place to stay 10/10 would recommend
Detailed Review: The staff was really good and very courteous, they all went out of their way to make me comfortable, truly an enjoyable stay. Plus the room was compact yet brimming with facilities. The quality of service and the room quality was top notch. There was nothing not to like, all in all it was a great stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: _shethsanket2015
Review: Budget hotel with good facilities in Andheri east
Detailed Review: We stayed at this hotel second time during our Mumbai visit after 6 years.  When we decided to visit Mumbai again, we searched for good options in Andheri and Ghatkopar west area. We wanted to'try' some new hotel but finally we selected again Le grande due to its economical tariffs and relatively good location with good facility. Staff was also good and helpful. On 1st day, there was some delay in getting hot water for bath but finally it was sorted out. As we had stayed here before 6 years, we observed that this hotel also is facing crisis due to lockdown (like many other businesses) inspite of less staff and economical crisis . they managed their best to give best possible satisfactory experience to their guests.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Khadija Murtaza
Detailed Review: Excellent enjoyed our stay staff were very friendly and welcoming felt like home, reasonable price for the rooms very considerate all services were given was excellent  we really enjoyed our stay looking forward to come again......

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Filieman
Review: Perfect place to unwind and recharge in Mumbai!
Detailed Review: This hotel was perfect for our stay in Mumbai. The staff was very welcoming and hospitable throughout our entire stay. Our room was very comfortable and the breakfast each morning was delicious. Mumbai is an intensely busy, loud, and fascinating city to explore so it was very nice having a comfortable refuge to go back to after a long day. They even made Americanos every morning for us to help get us ready for our sightseeing adventures!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Cat OBrien
Detailed Review: My fiancé and I stayed here for four nights. As Americans, we had never been to Mumbai before and felt a little fatigued with the heat and crowds. This hotel offered us a peaceful and comfortable getaway at the end of each day. The staff is incredibly kind and went out of their way to make sure that we had what we needed. The breakfast is delicious and was a great way to start the day.   I highly recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Victoria P
Detailed Review: This hotel is located perfectly for exploring Mumbai. Walking distance to the main areas to visit. The hotel is fitted with modern bathroom, with hot water 24/7 and comfortable beds. The staff go above and beyond to be friendly and helpful. Would recommend!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kalpana
Review: Awesome Experience!! Strongly Recommend this Hotel!!
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel with my family for about 3days. We are highly satisfied with the locality, cleanliness of the hotel and the hospitality of the hotel management. The staff are very courteous and very very helpful in all the way. I really should appreciate the magnanimous of the hotel. We booked two club rooms which are small in size for 7people as shown in the website. But considering the number of people in our,  they offered us spacious smart rooms with all modern facilities. They didn't even charge much for the extra bed, whereas in other hotels in and around this area they charge very high for the extra bed. We were all provided with good and delicious complementary breakfast for the whole 3 days. I will certainly prefer this hotel for our future stay also and I…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Isha shamra
Detailed Review: I stayed there for almost a week.. it was really nice and relaxing. The staff is very polite, welcoming and respectful..it has awesome breakfast menu... It was all over a great experience. Now I have found a place to stay whenever I visit mumbai and recommend others also..

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rajib Chattopadhyay
Review: A decent hotel with warm hospitality
Detailed Review: The hotel has an advantageous location, well maintained rooms and a very cordial staff. We, a group of eight, stayed there for a night in three suite rooms which were neat and well furnished. We left our luggage with the hotel after checking out of it in the morning and went to visit Elephanta Cave with the intention to come back in the afternoon and catch the train to Aurangabad from the adjacent CST. But getting delayed at Elephanta we missed our train. The hotel not only allowed us to wait at the reception but extended all cooperation until we could arrange a suitable cab to go to Aurangabad which was as late as 11pm. Mr. Hemond, the courteous manager, even pleasantly surprised us by waiving the charges of tea which we had ordered during our wait for 5 hours. Overall, it was a memorable stay there at the Hotel Elphinstone, Mumbai.…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: akshay m
Detailed Review: 5 star service provided by the hotel staff. All of the staffs are friendly and helpful. Rooms are clean and food is awsome. Special thanks to Mr. Peter for providing excellent experience. Having a wonderful stay in Residency Fort Hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nah J
Review: A gem of an oasis in a bustling city
Detailed Review: I needed a hotel for two nights. I chose this hotel as it was bang smack in the city AND because of the reviews I read from other customers. When I checked in the staff were amazing, very welcoming, and kind. I cannot say enough about the attitude of the staff. I was upgraded to a room in their new annex. I have to say I was shocked at how tastefully decorated the room was. The beds were amazingly comfortable. The bathrooms were clean and there was a rain shower.  One thing I wish was different was that there was no chain from inside the room to look the door. As a solo female traveller that was a bit disconcerting.  All in all, I would wholeheartedly endorse this hotel and hope I will be able to stay here again!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dr. Krutika
Review: It is very well maintained and clean hotel
Detailed Review: The staff is soo cooperative and kind,The owner him self takes keen interest of our hospitality.  The covid precautions were taken 100 percent. There were soo many options for breakfast a d it was very tasty and all hygiene precautions were taken. The rooms are very clean .overall It was a very worthy decision to book this hotel. Nice experience!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sudhanshu Pandey
Detailed Review: Well trained staff , Very clean hotel and room, Good Food quality and food taste also delicious  It’s my 3rd time well I’m staying in hotel Bawa regency hotel.. Good location  Pleasant place Thank you 😊

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: neil4ever22
Detailed Review: Went to this hotel after 2 years.  The hotel is a little worn down and unclean, with cobwebs in the room. The breakfast was limited but that's ok considering that many people are not travelling now.   But they had the basics delivered.  There is a lot of metro work going on in Colaba so that would be a hinderance for a few years.  One thing that always remain the same is the quality of staff at the hotel. Excellent service by Rajesh and company.  Always with a smile. C ya soon

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dagmar
Review: Good sleep but inconsistent with hygiene and covid rules
Detailed Review: Centrally located. I had a really good sleep as bedding and air conditioning are great. Reception/concierge and porter were great and followed the covid rules; checked my paper work and my vaccination, cleaned hands and wore the mandatory  face mask. It's a shame the breakfast team messed it up. The breakfast room was in a state and cutlery, plates and glasses were very dirty. Last nights dinner could be found on it....Most of the breakfast staff did not wear their mandatory face mask and if they did, it was halfway down their chin.  It's a shame this team did not live up to their colleagues standards.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jyotsna S
Review: Some places leave u with fond memories
Detailed Review: It was my first trip to Mumbai along with my husband and two sons aged 5 and 10... We knew nothing about Mumbai, I checked TripAdvisor rating like I always do and found this place... I did some random search about the place and found it appropriate. Here comes the icing on 🍰, the staff was very cooperative even on phone... I made 4 nights 5 days booking for this place taking leap of faith from their friendliness on phone... and I was right, it was indeed the best trip ever. 1) Its the safest place( one of our friend who is in Mumbai had also recommended us this place for being in the safest zone and away from city chaos) 2) located in the most posh area( South Mumbai) which is closer to chatrapati Shivaji terminus( a must visit railway station for its beautiful art and…

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: KinkyLondon
Review: Lovely hotel and great staff. Breakfast a disappointment.
Detailed Review: This is a comfortably 3 star hotel with helpful staff a 2 lifts. We chose this after our original choice turned out to be effectively a 1 star hotel, which we abandoned for Le Grande. Everywhere is beautifully and tastefully tiled. We were on the 6th floor, Executive room. I would stay here again without question. (Maybe the rooms on the other floors are different).  The room was very large with large desk/mirror (brilliant!), bed was comfortable, but duvet had the odd stains. There was a safe but didn't use. Tea/coffee/kettle/bottles of water. The bathroom was ok; not as plush and the walk in shower didn't have a curtain (broken rail) or a glass shield (as in the official pictures) - please install to prevent the whole floor from being wet.  Also I would recommend that wall liquid soap dispensers are installed to save on soap wastage and on small plastic bottles.  Breakfast was a disappointment: 2 or 3 hot spicy Indian dishes (varied daily), omelette with chillies, bread, butter, jam (only on one day), papaya chunks, watermelon juice, tea/coffee to order. No cereals/pastries/cakes. I don't like to have lunch/dinner as breakfast so I avoided all spicy dishes and asked for plain omelettes each day, and had bread and juice. Not having cereals was a MAJOR disappointment - but strangely it WAS available for extra on room service!  Had dinner a couple of times and they were great. Dinning room is great, the foyer is large and 2 people at reception.  We also needed to have PCR test done. The hotel arranged for someone to come to the room (Rs 800). Got the result in about 24hrs. There was an anomaly on one of the results which the hotel contacted the lab to have it corrected. Funnily the hotel got the PDF results and not on our phone. Providers were TruTest Laboratories in association with  IGenetic Diagnostics.  Hotel is on a quiet road, so no noise from nearby main road. A park with exercising machines is directly opposite.  One final note to the management: Please clean the AC filters.…

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Girish Pandey
Detailed Review: I visited this hotel in order to have the checkup for my wife in Tata Memorial Hospital  stayed on the third floor. The premises are kept well maintained  and clean. The front desk staff and all other staff are very helpful courteous and polite. The hotel does not allow food and beverages from outside (not even app delivery), but makes up for it with a good in-house kitchen and reasonably priced(no dining, only room service). Smooth check in and check out.   Overall impression was excellent.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jay Vyas
Detailed Review: The staff very polite and it was a Hassel free check in, However the bed sheets were dirty on cleaned, unhygienic rooms condition The food is great We did not have a telephone!! How do I order food or  contact the hotel guys! Later upon complaining the telephone was fitted in our room.  Not worth it , the management should look after such instances!!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vignesh Kumar
Review: Website photos are far from actual reality
Detailed Review: Room phone was out of order General cleanliness was very average Could here sounds of adjacent spaces in the room Not recommended overall Only positive was that the food was good Staff service was average

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Harshit Gehlot
Detailed Review: The Hotel staff is polite and helpful. Had a comfortable stay. rooms are clean and all amenities were working. They found out about our anniversary, and did beautiful decoration of the room with complementary cake. Its very good at the price compared to competition. Overall I would recommend this Hotel to everyone visiting with their Family.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Abhishek
Detailed Review: So this is our 3 rd stay at the property inna row...and everytime we have been offered a better service...Not only the comfort zone but the ease of stay,the kindness of the reception and staff were mind-blowing...a perfect stay in mumbai with no hassles....special thanks to Maninder ji ,srinath ji amd Ajay ji....would love to continue my staying in future and referring my friends too....

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: RB
Detailed Review: Right from the time I called to book a room until the time I checked out it was a super smooth process.   Kudos to the Front Desk staff of Maninder ji, Shrinath ji and Ajay ji. They were super co-operative and amazingly friendly. And obviously they gave me a free upgrade too.  Food was delicious and tasty. And the room service and house keeping was just perfect!   I was actually gonna stay for couple days but eventually landed up staying for a week. And these guys were so helpful in extending my stay where at times the hotel was sold out and they actually managed to extend me stay in the same room without any fuss.  Thank You team Bawa Regency. Will visit soon!!  P.S. - Sorry I haven't clicked any pics!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Paramita
Review: Excellent Stay at Bawa Regency Dadar.
Detailed Review: Stayed here for 12 days..  Excellent location, .just 1 km from Tata memorial hospital...  neat and clean room  ..very helpful staff.. Very good service..  Food is also very good. Overall very nice experience..

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Adamsonraj J
Detailed Review: There are hotels with two star gives class service and this is one among them.. highly recommend for both accommodation and restaurant .. Stayed @7th floor superior room with balcony view of Airport and it was top knotch .. thanks for the service and keeping hygienic

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vijay
Detailed Review: Friendly staff nice location clean rooms sanitized wash rooms good place for small functions and business meets. Well trained and good behaving staffs. Parking area bit small but enough to park 4 to 5 cars.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Garige Ashok
Detailed Review: Hotel is very nice, staff is very good. Excellent service received from staff and hotel management persons.  Appreciated for your service and immediate response.   We suggest this hotel for all my colleagues and relatives.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shobha T
Detailed Review: Excellent Place to Visit,  arrangements were good,  picked up from Airport,  nice hospitality.  Rooms were spacious & cleaned with all facility & food also goód & clean, near to airport,  well enjoyed...the travel

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Geetha C
Detailed Review: Very good facility & maintained cleanly..... immediate response from server’s anything urgent. A warm welcoming. If you have a chance to visit Mumbai.....please select Le-Grande. We enjoyed a lovely food of two day visit.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pradeep
Detailed Review: Excellent place for official meetings and interaction. Best food and hospitality in town and it's near to airport as well. Rooms are neat and clean dinning hall is big can fit to more than 50 people at a time

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Murugan Gangadharan
Detailed Review: For Business people's who frequently visits Crawford Market this the right place to stay very near to market by walk. Hotel cleneness is good friendly staff and management.Very near to Gate Way of India

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Raj S
Detailed Review: Average kind of hotel, but not like a shabby one. For a night or two it is ok. Staff are very loud & noisy on the living floors.  They won't clean your room until you ask for. Breakfast was served to the room due to C19 I believe. Not great breakfast. You get oily stuff for morning breakfast like Indian Puri sabzi & Parathas.   Tea coffee available in the rooms. Wifi was not great.   Front office staff were friendly.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pankaj Vashisth
Detailed Review: I’m from London stayed here during my quarantine, I would highly recommend this Hotel since it has got all the amenities in the desired budget. Excellent room service with great variety of food. A must visit Hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Viraj
Detailed Review: It’s a decent hotel. The staff is very co operative, helpful and polite. The food is amazing, it is a must try. It located in a quite area and it’s very relaxing. I had a wonderful experience staying at Le Grande.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dr Harsh
Review: One of the best in town
Detailed Review: One of the best hotels you can find in mumbai both for families and business. Staff is very courteous and helping. Caters to all your needs round the clock. Rooms are spacious and very comfortable. I stayed almost for a month. Worth the tarrif. Food is reasonably priced and good. And the biggest advantage is the location which is close to everything there is in mumbai. They took all necessary precautions for safety during this covid period. Completely satisfied and highly recommend the hotel.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: GrandTour10766471992
Detailed Review: very well situated. easy walk to dadar station. spotlessly clean. very helpful and professional staff. recommended. i was a single woman and felt very safe at all times. fridge in the room and kettle for making tea was nice.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Varsha Diyawar
Detailed Review: The location is good , rooms are neat and clean with well sanitized service was good overall all superb  Thank you Maninder ji for all your support from you and your staff your staff were superb they treated as like family during tough times. This really means alot to me I really want to thanks Shrinath , Amay  , Jyoti Madam and security uncle. They all were awesome. Thank you  from Varsha Diyawar

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ryan
Detailed Review: It was very clean and the staffs were extremely polite and friendly. The food was very good . The room service was highly appreciable and all the covid protocol was followed strictly. I'm highly satisfied by the stay

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ravi Nakum
Detailed Review: Ambience is nice. Clean and sanitized rooms. Food is exceptionally good, Specially Morning breakfast. Got complimentary breakfast. Hotel manager Maninder is very welcoming and friendly. Staff is also taking precautions for maintaining social distancing.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Srikar Gannavarapu
Detailed Review: I have first lodged here myself in September 2020. From then this is my fourth time I have been here. Support staff are super friendly, sensible and reliable. Very great deals subjected to entrusted loyalty from customer side. Kudos to Bawa group for making customer stick to you 🔥

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ankur B
Detailed Review: A great place to stay.. clean and comfortable rooms with good foods..The entire staff was very well mannered and their hospitality and responses were amazingly good.. Highly appreciated and recommended..

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: supernova
Detailed Review: everything was very good in hotel really we are enjoying our stay house keeping were also very good bed making also very good and tidy and we found clean and neat room with fresh linen so we would like to come here again

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Varen Kumar Rao
Detailed Review: Room number 220. I am getting best service from your staff. Specially Mr.Paresh gives me the Best Service.Nice Hotel and rooms. Good service from Ms Chayanika,Ms Mehreen in Front Office with Mr.Zoheb.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: supernova
Detailed Review: It's an ideal place for crashing in between ur flights. Small but cozy rooms, adequate restaurant, wifi and 24/7 room service. What else you need. Staff at the reception is very courteous and all the staff had smile on face. Will surely come again and recommend

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: prasad k
Detailed Review: I stayed at hotel Le grande for a week for quarantine .The service was excellent,the staff was friendly and very helpful  . Rooms were clean and the food they offered was of good quality and on time.  I will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends from who are coming from abroad.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shangril Chaitanya
Detailed Review: Very friendly staff that makes you feel at home. Good hygiene and prompt room service. Food quality and quantity is satisfactorily adequate. Close to the airport and access to south Mumbai too easy and quick.   Value for money..!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Raphael R
Detailed Review: Had stayed for over a-weak,from a check in to check out had a memorable experience;the hotel is clean and hygiene and was included with food their breakfast,lunch and dinner has a good option. Would like to thank Ramu,Sadanand and ebby for taking a good care of us.And also want to thank the management for making our stay memorable.cheers and see you soon Thank you 😍😍😍😍

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jaganmeet
Detailed Review: Good hotel for short stay.Arranged by company to be in quarantine for 7 days.Lift is there which a good facility to have.Cooperative and helpful staff.Pick up and Drop facility from Airport.Can improve on food.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: AustinBerchy
Detailed Review: Me and my friend booked this hotel for 7 nights I must say it was one the best hospitality experience we have ever had in Mumbai, we have traveled to Dubai and Seychelles and I must commend the staff especially Mr. Sadanand, Mr. Ramu Mr. Ebby Manoj and Suraj and a few other I may not recall the names are simply outstanding, no request takes too long cleanliness is spotless very very professional team kudos to the Senior management and ofcourse Mr. Nayeem for leading by example.. Thank you guys will definitely come back.  Good luck. Austin Berchy. Hyderabad.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Muthuraj Muniasamy
Review: Very good. All staffs are friendly
Detailed Review: Good location.  Very neat space.  Friendly staffs .  Food service good. Near to airport  Lower price  U can access all important places from here Budget friendly rooms and extra bed is just 500 rupees. Totally fine

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ajit Choudhari
Detailed Review: Stayed 7 days for quarantine in the hotel.  The Gentleman at reception gave me proper guidance for documents require during the travel and process. It was a very good stay, food with hygiene.  •	Hotel staff is very nice,they treated as a family member.  •	Nearest Airport and hotel offer service for drop and pickup. *      Food  tasty with hygiene. Thank you. Strongly recommitted    Regards Ajit Choudhari

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: TravellerMishra
Detailed Review: Stayed in the hotel for 7 days for my quarantine after returning from abroad. It was a very good stay with good hygiene, very helpful staff.  Especially the manager who helped in all the possible ways. The food was good and hotel is also decent.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: John C
Review: Fantastic Hotel in a Great Location - 5 stars!
Detailed Review: Hemond and his team looked after us so well. The room we booked, the Deluxe was fantastic. For a smaller sized hotel, the room had enough space to do everything we needed to. The complimentary breakfast was great, and tea in the afternoons was a nice treat. We used the room as a base for exploring Mumbai, and our first trip to Mumbai was made so much easier by Hemond and his team. From recommending genuine, authentic places to eat, and best times for travelling throughout the busy city to avoid the worst traffic, as well as helping us with finding tailors and activities we were looking for - we couldnt have asked for more. Hemond and his team turned our trip to India from a good trip to a great trip. Can't wait to visit again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Stephen B
Detailed Review: After booking my stay I needed to arrive a day earlier. The communication with the hotel was timely and clear, everything I needed.   Arriving at 2.30 am I was greeted with a chilled bottle of water and a friendly welcome. I couldn’t be accommodated in my deluxe room that first night, as I had been told, but was moved  first thing the next morning.  The breakfast was just right and the staff couldn’t do enough to assist my stay. In particular Hemond, the Manager, went out of his way to help. I was having difficulty confirming the hotel for the next part of my trip. After assisting me with numerous calls he allowed me the use of his own personal mobile to resolve the issue, customer service at its best.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anthony G
Detailed Review: My wife and I stayed at the residency twice Feb and March very clean hotel great staff who will go out of there way to help you nothing was to much trouble for them breakfast was more than adequate egg station cereals pastries cakes cereals fruit ect tea coffee fruit juices plus plenty of local Indian dishes to try if you fancied that  2nd visit we were upgraded to room 704 just outside hotel main  building wow what a room or suite I should say a real wow factor and yet again this was down to the staff a big thank you to you all and very much appreciated this room really made myself and my wife lost for words Great position all main attractions walking distance from hotel plus the hotel arranged a private tour of mumbai over  a 2 day period which I would highly recommend at a…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: savvy2olympia
Detailed Review: We have stayed in this hotel before and have never been disappointed. The location is excellent and it is a good value. It is in a safe area with many sights, excellent restaurants and good shopping within walking distance. The staff is welcoming, friendly, and goes the extra mile to make your stay comfortable and memorable. We stayed in one of the annexes this time, and the room was a good size and the bed and pillows super comfortable. All of the areas of the hotel are exceptionally clean. The included breakfast was delicious, with omelets/eggs made to order, pancakes, fresh fruit, pastries, Indian dishes, etc,  Even had espresso, latte, or cappuccino coffee!  We always recommend this hotel to our friends, and we look forward to staying again on a return visit to Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Brenda P
Detailed Review: Had 2 nigths here with friends as a start of holiday. Small boutique hotel. Not the flashest, but boy the staff make up for any imperfection. Desk staff fabulous,  very helpful in every way. Staff in restaurant amazing. What ever we wanted they went out of their way to accomodate. Would stay again in a flash. Well done staff.....

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Brage M
Review: Perfect location for a vacation in Mumbai
Detailed Review: This hotel was a perfect place for a few nights in Mumbai! They helped us book a tour guide for the whole day, which was lovely and also a taxi back to the hotel for a really good price.   The rooms are nice and the breakfast had a really good omelet, made to order. Really good hospitality, especially from Gopal, who helped with the taxi.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: aggi12
Detailed Review: We had a very good experience, staff was very helpful and forthcoming. Location is excellent if you want to be in the heart of things. Breakfast was also really good. For Mumbai value-for-money was really good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Alex H
Detailed Review: Well, great hotel, all staff are so helpful, Was upgraded free of charge, and rooms are so clean spacious, and nice lay out for breakfast, and Ideal location for walking around Mumbai  Will book again when I comeback to Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mamafaf
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel and good value. A very warm welcome on arrival, attention to detail by all staff, and nothing is too much trouble. I stayed for 2 nights last week and have just returned for another night. Looking forward to another splendid Indian breakfast in the morning! Thanks to all the staff, especially the very kind and thoughtful Gopal.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Chris C
Detailed Review: We stayed in the suite room which was perfect for a family of 4. The service was excellent from all the staff and the breakfast was cooked freshly and as much as you like. Even the taxis linked to the hotel are reasonably priced which makes a nice change. All in all perfect stay especially if in need of some comfort and calm.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Michael T
Detailed Review: Must compliment the Residency Hotel in South Mumbai in the Fort district. Very professional and well organised Hotel.  A team focused on ensuring their guest have a very comfortable stay.  Our hotel room in their Residency club area was a very modern room and fitted out with all the modern high tech switches and facilities - even the ensuite bathroom.  The staff just wanted to please.  Very impressed wirh Gopal , who made our stay ever more comfortable.  Very impressed with the complimentary comprehensive breakfast and my unlimited capouccinos..  This is a well organised hotel, we will definitely return and would highly recommend to anyone.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Andy B
Review: Fabulous staff in the heart of The Fort
Detailed Review: A great hotel in the heart of the fort. Excellent location for exploring Mumbai. Clean, comfortable, nice bathroom with hot shower, and good breakfasts. The staff made it for us, especially the restaurant manager Peter and concierge Rajesh. They went out of their way to look after us.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Asmita M
Detailed Review: Stayed in the hotel for a night and it was a very comfortable stay. Helpful and polite staff. The property is centrally located but the area is peaceful.Dadar rail station is walking distance. The food they serve is delectable.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: LuckyGirl58
Detailed Review: This hotel was a great find in Mumbai. When we first arrived to this hotel, we were a bit wary but once we got inside, any trepidation we had disappeared. Hemond, the manager was so welcoming. He showed us a couple of different rooms which were both nice. The rooms aren’t big but the place is spotless and the beds comfy. Breakfast was included which was nice. All the staff at this hotel were excellent and they treat their guests very well. Tea in the afternoon was a nice bonus as were the massage chairs available to guests. It was so nice to come back to the hotel after a day of walking around busy Mumbai. I highly recommend this hotel if you are visiting Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ash
Review: It’s good hotel in a good location excellent service
Detailed Review: We had stayed here for one night it’s a good property in good location neat and clean rooms friendly staff very near too all stations like cstm Marine Lines station and Churchgate station all are walking distance from here metro cinemas is opposite too the hotel all eateries are near by walking distance from here bombay hospital all our experience was awesome excellent service from all off there staff from check inn till check out we will visit definitely next time 😊

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ijeoma N
Detailed Review: Friendly and helpful staff at Hotel Fortune. Enjoyed my taxi tour with Jamal. I got to see a lot in the day I had and he was very kind. Enjoying my stay at the moment and time in Mumbai. Good location too. Thank you!

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ash
Review: It’s good hotel in a good location excellent service
Detailed Review: We had stayed here for one night it’s a good property in good location neat and clean rooms friendly staff very near too all stations like cstm Marine Lines station and Churchgate station all are walking distance from here metro cinemas is opposite too the hotel all eateries are near by walking distance from here bombay hospital all our experience was awesome excellent service from all off there staff from check inn till check out we will visit definitely next time 😊

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ijeoma N
Detailed Review: Friendly and helpful staff at Hotel Fortune. Enjoyed my taxi tour with Jamal. I got to see a lot in the day I had and he was very kind. Enjoying my stay at the moment and time in Mumbai. Good location too. Thank you!

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ash
Review: It’s good hotel in a good location excellent service
Detailed Review: We had stayed here for one night it’s a good property in good location neat and clean rooms friendly staff very near too all stations like cstm Marine Lines station and Churchgate station all are walking distance from here metro cinemas is opposite too the hotel all eateries are near by walking distance from here bombay hospital all our experience was awesome excellent service from all off there staff from check inn till check out we will visit definitely next time 😊

Detailed Review: Friendly and helpful staff at Hotel Fortune. Enjoyed my taxi tour with Jamal. I got to see a lot in the day I had and he was very kind. Enjoying my stay at the moment and time in Mumbai. Good location too. Thank you!

Name: ash
Review: It’s good hotel in a good location excellent service
Detailed Review: We had stayed here for one night it’s a good property in good location neat and clean rooms friendly staff very near too all stations like cstm Marine Lines station and Churchgate station all are walking distance from here metro cinemas is opposite too the hotel all eateries are near by walking distance from here bombay hospital all our experience was awesome excellent service from all off there staff from check inn till check out we will visit definitely next time 😊

Name: Ijeoma N
Detailed Review: Friendly and helpful staff at Hotel Fortune. Enjoyed my taxi tour with Jamal. I got to see a lot in the day I had and he was very kind. Enjoying my stay at the moment and time in Mumbai. Good location too. Thank you!

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ash
Review: It’s good hotel in a good location excellent service
Detailed Review: We had stayed here for one night it’s a good property in good location neat and clean rooms friendly staff very near too all stations like cstm Marine Lines station and Churchgate station all are walking distance from here metro cinemas is opposite too the hotel all eateries are near by walking distance from here bombay hospital all our experience was awesome excellent service from all off there staff from check inn till check out we will visit definitely next time 😊

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ijeoma N
Detailed Review: Friendly and helpful staff at Hotel Fortune. Enjoyed my taxi tour with Jamal. I got to see a lot in the day I had and he was very kind. Enjoying my stay at the moment and time in Mumbai. Good location too. Thank you!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aloba3591
Detailed Review: Unfortunatly we booked a "Deluxe twin room" and we got the n° 308, very, very little room. The door of the bathroom is so heavy that you must be very strong to open it 1 Why ? No towel hook in the bathroom and the shower has low pression. You cannot support anything an the sink. The breakfast is no bad, but the area is little and it's easy, in the morning, you have to wait for a free table. Wifi is ok. The beds are little, 1,80 mt, not suitable for men like me 1,90mt. I slept with my feet outside the bed !!! But the staff is very, very kindly and helpful, excellent the position, so we are not disappointed for the problems we found.  Ivanromeo.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: PamFrance
Detailed Review: Could not fault anything.  Location, cleanliness, comfort, food etc.  were excellent. plus a very good inexpensive laundry service.The staff are wonderfully caring, friendly and conscientious.  Look foward to staying again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Paula H
Detailed Review: The hotel is very well placed for the places to visit, the rooms are a good size and comfortable beds, but the BEST thing about this hotel is the staff- they couldn’t be more helpful or friendly- this is the best place to stay. I have stayed 3 times and look forwards to the next time. Thank you for a great stay for my yoga students and myself- 10 of us. Paula

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: deep757
Review: THE place to stay in Mumbai!
Detailed Review: We had a room that apart from the main hotel and it was amazing. Quiet, clean, comfortable beds, great shower. It is walking distance to all the major attractions. However, the best thing about this hotel is the staff, especially in the dining room. Thanks for making our staff so very special!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: lyndab47
Detailed Review: We stayed here twice, a few years back and when planning a new trip to Mumbai we did not hesitate in our choice of hotel. The Residency Fort and its staff are as  friendly, welcoming, helpful and polite as always. They have built an annex next door with much bigger rooms, which made the stay even more special. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 2lf
Detailed Review: Good location close to all there is to see in Mumbai  staff great customer service very good and comfort and free water every day and good choice for breakfast. As must is to book city tours  through hotel  as hkeem the driver  speaks good English and very safe and very knowledgeable

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: L R
Review: Very pleasant stay at this hotel
Detailed Review: At the end of our four week trip we spent our last two nights in Mumbai. We were treated warmly at reception desk. Plenty of available staff to assist with luggage. The room appeared very small initially but not as small as hotels we have stayed in Paris. I believe it has to do with being old buildings. The bathroom was spacious, there was a closet with drawers and adequate space for hanging clothes. A desk made a great location to place our opened suitcases.  All staff members we interacted with with were helpful and pleasant. Coordinating taxi service was very easy. The hotel arranged a tour for us that was wonderful. We saw sights that we never would have found on our own and the guide was wonderfully informative. He was also exceedingly patient as we browsed through the…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mwspear
Review: Back again to this ideal base.
Detailed Review: Back again, the Hotel Residency Fort did not disappoint. Clean, modern, well thought out rooms and friendly, helpful staff make this a great place to explore the Fort, Colaba and Gateway of India areas.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Robert W
Detailed Review: This was my first visit to India. I was so lucky to have chosen the Residency Hotel Fort. The room was of a very high standard. The staff were extremely professional and nothing was too much trouble. Special thanks to Concierge Rajesh who helped to make my visit so memorable. The Residency is very well situated for sightseeing. The magnificent CST railway station is nearby and the India Gateway within walking distance. I have no hesitation in recommending the Residency Hotel Fort.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Elaine B
Review: Like coming home and being spoilt
Detailed Review: Three years ago I luckily booked at random this hotel for our brief stay in Mumbai. This time was our third stay. The staff are wonderful. Every year we get to try a different wing and the reception go out of their way to give us noise free as the metro construction is all around. There is abundant coffee and tea. Breakfast is very good. Everyone remembers us. We are recommended a wonderful nearby restaurant. Every member of staff is helpful. And totally honest which I can vouch for as my husband's wallet fell out of his pocket and even before he noticed it one of the staff came running with it. Our Mumbai home

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Martin Canavan
Detailed Review: Great hotel in a central location in Fort area. Excellent for seeing all the sights in and around south Mumbai. Great team at the hotel, who were all super helpful and attentive. Special mention for Ghopal and Rajesh who were great at arranging things for us and helping with everything we needed.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anindya C
Detailed Review: I stayed here for 3 days with my wife and 2.5 years old. We loved the cozy and homely atmosphere. The property is centrally located. Gateway of India is walkable. There are many restaurants and cafes around. Service is prompt and complementary breakfast was limited but of good quality.  The breakfast area is small, so you may need to wait sometimes.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vic79uk
Detailed Review: I’ve stayed here a couple of times and it never disappoints. Great service from all staff. Friendly and super helpful. Comfortable and very clean rooms. Good selection of food for breakfast and able to make lots of great recommendations for places to eat out of the hotel. Really nicely located for lots of parts of Mumbai that you can explore on foot. Will always be my first choice hotel when visiting Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Alexa R
Review: Best place to stay in Mumbai!
Detailed Review: Fantastic week stay at Hotel Residency Fort! Clean rooms, great complimentary breakfast - fast wifi, great service ! The staff were amazing ! Concierge Rajesh was so helpful - organizing taxis and letting us know what to expect to pay , making sure we had everything we needed and always welcoming - nothing was too much trouble . Roshan was also amazing ! I left my mobile in a store and he kindly rang them for me and organized very quickly a taxi to and from the store to pick it up .All staff fantastic and attentive really wanting you to have a great stay. As a woman traveler if I am able to return again to Mumbai and I was alone or with another female traveler I would definitely stay at Hotel residency Fort . Felt very safe at all times . Thank you 🙏

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sajjuom
Detailed Review: We stayed at this hotel for two nights. They have good food and the rooms are not very cozy but are fine for some nights.  The plus point is that it is near the airport and the hotel offers pick up and drop services.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kishore Marne
Detailed Review: We stayed overnight at this place. The hotel is located ideally with Shopping area, nice restaurants, Dadar VT Station etc all in walking distance. The staff were very helpful and the room and washrooms were very clean and tidy. Room service was also prompt.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mariana P
Detailed Review: I recommend this hotel because of the treatment with the guests, the receptionists are very kind and helpful. The hotel has a good location close to the Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus railway station. Also, the room was clean and very comfortable. I would stay there again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anna R
Detailed Review: I only gave this hotel a 3 star because of its room size. The one thing this hotel has going for it, is it’s fantastic staff. Very caring and helpful. Nice little hotel and very good use of space, but the room we stayed was very small, with no window. I’m so glad we were traveling with carry on luggage, as there was just about enough space to store each case at the end of the bed. No safe or hair dryer in room and we had to ask for toilet paper. Charged extra for an additional cup of coffee.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Abinesh
Detailed Review: the staff service was great and the reception was warm and welcoming. i was a solo traveller so i stayed at one of their much smaller rooms, would definitely recommend their bigger rooms for people travelling in pairs or groups. the hotel's location was ideal if you want to do the usual touristy stuffs in south mumbai. the breakfast was okay for the price and they served tea in the evenings in the lobby and also when you first arrive, so the check-in was smooth and easy. would certainly stay there on my next visit to mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jordan D
Detailed Review: This was a fantastic hidden gem, do not let the outside facade deter you because the inside and the facilities were great. The hotel was very clean the staff knowledgeable. The rooms had everything you needed and the beds were comfy. The superior twin rooms seem a bit smaller so I recommend the deluxe room.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jonas H
Detailed Review: We stayed for two nights since we were not entirely sure if we want to stay there for the full visit in Mumbai. Unfortunately we had too move since the hotel was fully booked for the following nights.  We definitely recommend the larger rooms with windows.  During our stay we had an issue with a overseas package. The hotel manager was very helpful in resolving the issue.  The hotel is clean. It has a nice lobby with free chai from 5pm to 7pm.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Amber S
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel staff so good n very nice service I always stay this hotel receptionist are so good staff are very nice service I am 2 days stay n rooms are so clean n staff service very nice morning breakfast very nice n good....

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Gurdev
Detailed Review: The stay was very good as we all were with the family enjoyed alot and the visit was very memorable...the hospitality is amazing and the services are also very good and the staff is amazing as well .. Love to visit again very soon

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vikram sharma
Detailed Review: We visited this property during first week of Oct 2019, I chosen this hotel based on reviews and it was 100 % true. We enjoyed the hotel in terms of its location( on mall road) , food and hospitality. I have even visited Taj, but i can give assurance that in terms of service it is incomparable ( it might be due to less occupancy at that time...!!!!!!! )

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Geeta
Detailed Review: Visited mussoorie for two days. Found Fortune Grace Resort an excellent place. Happy open place on terrace area ,Spacious rooms , Lavish breakfast , friendly and eager to help staff - all made our trip memorable . Another highlight was the open area . I wish to stay here only whenever I visit the queen of hills .

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Gurdev
Detailed Review: The stay was very good as we all were with the family enjoyed alot and the visit was very memorable...the hospitality is amazing and the services are also very good and the staff is amazing as well .. Love to visit again very soon

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vikram sharma
Detailed Review: We visited this property during first week of Oct 2019, I chosen this hotel based on reviews and it was 100 % true. We enjoyed the hotel in terms of its location( on mall road) , food and hospitality. I have even visited Taj, but i can give assurance that in terms of service it is incomparable ( it might be due to less occupancy at that time...!!!!!!! )

I wish to stay here only whenever I visit the queen of hills .
