Happy open place on terrace area ,Spacious rooms , Lavish breakfast , friendly and eager to help staff - all made our trip memorable . Another highlight was the open area . I wish to stay here only whenever I visit the queen of hills .

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: JTreloar
Detailed Review: Nothing missing from this very well positioned hotel in Mumbai.  Close to the central station and many different directions to walk and soak up the beauty and ambiance of Mumbai.  The staff were excellent, particularly the staff at breakfast.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: oldiesontherun
Review: This hotel is lovely but has building work next door.
Detailed Review: We enjoyed this hotel. The staff were very pleasant and helpful. Our room was compact but very nice. The hotel has fresh lime juice free in reception , all day and complimentary tea/ coffee and biscuits, in the restaurant lounge each afternoon. The only drawback, at the moment was the excavation of the new underground system, right next door. The works are 24hrs a day. The road opposite has open urinals and a rubbish sorting venue. Once in the hotel these things didn't matter.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Olaf B
Review: Excellent mid-class hotel in the middle of Mumbai
Detailed Review: I had a very good, but short visit in Mumbai. The Residency Hotel in Fort provided me with an excellent and comfortable home, a lovely breakfast and an awesome team - especially Concierge Rajesh - who made me feel like part of the family. The standard is mid-class, but absolute clean and comfortable. So, if you look for a great price and excellent service, you should pick this hotel. Given the construction side in front of the hotel (still working on the Metro station for a while), try to get a room in some of their two rear buildings. Here you don’t hear a single noise! Thank you again, Team Residency! 🙏🏻🇮🇳

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ad1e69
Review: Massive club room in new wing
Detailed Review: Only stayed one night in Mumbai so pleased we stayed at the hotel Residency fort, our brand new club room was out of this world it was the nicest hotel room I have ever stayed in, it was very spacious with a massive king size bed & spotlessly clean it seemed brand new. The breakfast didn’t quite leave the same impression it was ok for one morning though but much more we would of struggled a bit, it was quite Indian style buffet. Special mention to the hotel staff they tried very hard to help you with any questions etc Gopal was very helpful in sorting and finding our Uber for us.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Michelle M
Detailed Review: The team at the hotel made our time in Mumbai so pleasant. From their exceptional service, to the free tea, coffee and biscuits to the welcome gifts and massage chair. Oh and the breakfast omelette!  This place is worth every cent. Would come back Time and time again. Thank you

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ravish Malik
Detailed Review: My wife and Mother in law stayed at this hotel for 3 nights in Jan 2020. The hospitality and warmth cannot be explained with words. In my wife’s words, its her best hotel experience yet. We now have a hotel for repetitive visits

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Elise
Detailed Review: Wonderful hotel for our one night in Mumbai! It was the perfect location for exploring the city- very close to a lot of main attractions. The staff were extremely helpful and attentive- especially Gopal and Kesia and Rajesh! We were able to store our bags for hours after check out until leaving for the airport. We were still able to relax in the lounge with complementary tea, coffee, and cookies after check out too. Breakfast was included and was a great spread.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Loubiedo
Detailed Review: Stayed 4 nights in a club room, clean and modern with WiFi Aircon and fridge. Good lounge facilities, and the best breakfasts we had during our 3weeks in India. Plenty of shops and eating places nearby, safe to walk about, minimal disruption from new metro works. Thanks to Peter, Gopal, the room boys and everyone of the polite and helpful staff who made our stay an absolute pleasure

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Saskia K
Detailed Review: As ever very good value hotel, comfortable though small rooms, very friendly and helpful staff and excellent breakfast, unbeatable location, lot of sites in walking distance, very good restaurants nearby

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Wearside_Wanderer
Detailed Review: We spent 3 nights here. Loved the location which put us within easy walking distance of most of the places we wanted to see.  We had booked a Club Room to make sure the metro works didn't interupt our sleep and it worked well in that respect. The room itself was modern and comfortable but we found it a bit small.  Good breakfast but again space was an issue with the breakfast room being too small for the number of guests so we had to wait for a table each morning. It had a bit of a cramped feeling too because of the number of tables shoehorned in.  Hotel staff were brilliant and are a credit to the place.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: canutells2017
Detailed Review: Its our 1st visit to India and Mumbai was our 1st stop. if you are visiting the city save yourself the time and just book "Hotel Residency Fort"  there is the new metro which is still under construction but they gave us an upgrade into the building next door. It is awesome and full renovated the entrance hall and rooms are wonderful.   There is a lovely rest area between reception and the dining room where there is all day freshly made tea and coffee along with cookies in jars that are also available all day, newspaper is delivered to your room each morning.  The attention from the staff is fantastic they are just so attentive, breakfast is great with plenty of choice I just loved the Masala and cheese Dosas for English people in particular they even have Tetley tea bags and…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Gary S
Detailed Review: Wonderful breakfast and amazing helpful staff.  a metro line is under construction so be mindful of the potential noise at night. I was moved when requested, very accommodating. Strategic location and historic sights within walking distance.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HumanGiant
Review: Great hotel and great service, especially Rajesh!
Detailed Review: Great location for this hotel for exploring all the great sites Mumbai has to offer, transportation in Mumbai is not easy so being close to all the sites is essential and lots of great restaurants nearby.   The hotel is super clean and comfortable and breakfast is also varied and very tasty.  People make Mumbai and the service at this hotel shows this as all the staff are very efficient and therefore all your needs no matter how big or small, we were particularly impressed by Rajesh, he made our stay in Mumbai even better,   Thank you so much for a memorisable trip.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rrroul
Detailed Review: The hotel was great, good location, excellent rooms (we were in the 40x wing, only 50m from the main entrance) and great service all around from the friendly and professional staff. The hotel concierge Rajesh was fantastic, organising anything from a great SoBo tour, to refreshments and taxi rides. And the breakfast host Peter (see picture) always made sure we had a great table at the breakfast. The rooms were very modern and well equipped, with AC, fridge, complementary bottles water daily, TV and great beds full of pillows. We would definately come back here again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: KoolFork
Detailed Review: Fort is a good location for tourists and close to several places to eat. We had a double on the front with a window and aircon and a stylish bathroom. Clean with good linen and towels. Room safes and fridge too. However, what makes this hotel is the service. The front of house staff organised trips (good prices too) and SIM cards, suggested where to shop, etc. Breakfast is good too - Western and Indian options.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Molly Stanbridge
Review: Could not rate this place more highly!
Detailed Review: Hotel Residency Fort is the best place we have ever stayed. The location in fort was perfect. The rooms were pristine clean with waterfall like showers, we had the comfiest bed with touch screen light switches. It was more than a 5 star hotel offers. The breakfast included was incredible (we loved the dosas!!) and the staff went above and beyond to greet and help you no matter how busy they were. The only thing we would suggest is maybe having more breakfast tables as sometimes you had to wait (but it was so insignificant compared to all of the pros that it didn’t even worry us at all)!! Would recommend it to anyone and everyone.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vijay
Detailed Review: I would like to thank hotel staff for their excellent service. Gopal was more like a brother. Very helpful and always willing to go that extra mile for our family. Balu ,Rajesh ,kesar and all staff from reception to house keeping thanks a million for your brilliant service. Really appreciate every bit of it.Thanks for the cool drink and chips on arrival and also coffee and biscuits. Residency Mumbai is Number 1.Would try my best to see you guys again.My kids want to come back and i just arrived back home.Thanx again from VIJAY (SHAKASKRAAL )DURBAN

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: NIRISHA
Review: Best hotel in Mumbai-value for money
Detailed Review: I have returned to this hotel for the second time and I enjoyed every bit of my stay. This hotel offers more than a 5 star hotel. Entire hotel is very clean but the hotel staff is the highlight of the hotel. Very friendly staff, always willing to help their guests. They go beyond their duty to ensure a fantastic stay.  Our family of 11 people including kids loved our stay.  Special mention to Gopal for being a gem of a person. Rajesh, Balu and Kesar also treated us with respect and care. Even the hotel cleaners are so friendly and helpful. Residency Owner, your biggest asset is your staff, they make your guest stay very comfortable, feels like family and home.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Perry S
Detailed Review: Hotel and room was very nice, was offered a free upgrade to a suite when I checked in which was very big and nice. Staff very helpful and friendly and helped me booking taxi/Uber/ola and tried to get me the cheapest price possible. Breakfast included in the room rate was great. Was also able to pay extra for a 7pm last check out as I had a midnight flight which was very helpful. Good location in Fort walking distance to Colaba and Churchgate/marina. Would definitely stay here again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sam r
Detailed Review: We had such a lovely stay here. From the moment we arrived the staff couldnt have done more for us. It was our first time in mumbai and the staff informed us of restaurants to visit, places to visit. Rajesh was really helpful and kind and friendly he got us a tour of the city with a guide who spoke really good english named sunil for cheaper than the local guides from the travel departments in the street. Breakfast was really tasty theres a variety of cakes, fruit, cereals the staff again were always offering help and service was amazing. Breakfast had fresh eggs to order as well as waffles and pancakes and omlettes. Really recommend this hotel however the room we had was a little small that is the only very small issue we had but the staff did apologise that the room was small.…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Karen W
Detailed Review: Can’t fault the hotel at all, the staff go out of their way to ensure a comfortable stay and any problems are dealt with immediately with efficiency and a smile. Rooms are clean, many different, location excellent as most sights within Mumbai are within walking distance

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: supermn88
Detailed Review: Stayed here one night before a flight home.  Great location, i was able to walk to many restaurants and tourist destinations. The staff was very nice and were very familiar with the area. Thanks Rajas for your help during my stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kayleigh B
Detailed Review: This was the first place we'd stayed in India and the team set the bar high! They were so accommodating, helpful and friendly and made the start of our trip memorable, comfortable and fun.   The hotel itself is nice enough, a little bit dated in places (the professional pictures on here definitely show its best side), but the warm and welcoming team more than make up for this.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Family of Four
Detailed Review: The concierge staff never leave, so there are always many helpers 24/7. I had a need to see a doctor, Rajesh personally took me to the local doctor through the many small streets and set up the time and appointment. The doctor was excellent and very helpful, and I'm now all fixed. Thanks

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: PDS2
Detailed Review: We stayed here for one night on arrival in India and for a further four nights at the end of our stay. The hotel is located in the Fort area within walking distance of many of Mumbai's main sites of interest.  The hotel dates back to the 1930s, but the rooms are modern, clean and reasonably well-appointed.  Breakfast is included in the room rate, and includes a wide range of options, many cooked to order.  The hotel retains many traditional qualities, and all the staff - on reception, in the restaurant, bellboys and cleaners - were very helpful and courteous. Overall, a very good value option. However, the major metro works under way in Mumbai run very close to the hotel and often involve heavy work running into the night.  Our first night was badly disturbed by this (not ideal…

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anil G
Review: The best hotel in the Fort area
Detailed Review: This hotel was by far the best hotel that we stayed at in the Fort Area. Special mention must be made of the the concierge Rajeshbhai, who provided us with excellent advice everyday. The reception staff are available for your every need and the kitchen staff make you feel most welcome.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Hungry traveller
Detailed Review: We had a lovely stay here in one of their club rooms. The local is central, walking distance to all main attractions. Breakfast is very tasty with good Indian and western options. Laundry service is also good, they laundered some ornate dresses for me. All hotel staff are very kind and go out of their way to make you feel welcome. Special shout out to Gopal who helped us with organising our transport to the airport. We would stay again!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kirsty T
Detailed Review: We have stayed here twice, both times in a club room which are lovely! Excellent value. Comfortable beds and pillows. Breakfast dosa and coffee is Amazing. Kesar makes fab cappuccino art. Highly recommend

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mel & Thirza Asia tour
Detailed Review: The stay was superb. The personnel really made us feel like home with their hospitality and helped us with numerous tips to get the most of our (short) stay in Mumbai. Special thanks to Gopal and Rajesh which were always up for a good talk and practical tips for in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vanessa H
Review: Hotel gave our room away - not safe for women
Detailed Review: I booked this hotel as we were only going to be staying for a few hours after our flight from London to Mumbai. We would then be travelling to our next destination early in the morning. Firstly the hotel driver was not there when we collected our luggage at 4.30 am bearing in mind the time. Then with no advanced notice he took us to a very dodgy hotel and threw our luggage on the ground and said Hotel Le grand is overbooked, we gave your room away so you're staying here. The place they took us was dilapidated, had no proper hotel sign. When I tried to complain they paid no attention and there was no accountability.   Left with no choice as our driver was not coming until 8 am we took the room, which had no key to the room. They were about 5 men standing around making both my…

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: miatom
Detailed Review: We stayed as a family at Hotel Le Grande on 11 Jan 20. First things first - this hotel is not three star by any count of hygiene, quality and customer service ! The linen was plain dirty, toilet leaks and the bathroom walls not scrubbed probably for months.   The iron & iron board took four hours to be delivered and when it did come - was a board which should be at least a decade old - stained with poking nails and an iron which has seen many moons !   On request the linen was changed. The only saving grace was the food which was sumptuous both in quantity and quality.   Dirt seemed to be the byword - dirty stairs , dirty lift and dirty rooms ! Stay at your own peril.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Gowri Suresh
Detailed Review: This hotel is really located at centre of Delhi. This is my first visit at hotel ajanta and I feel like home here. Staff is very nice always ready to help you out. Food is also good. We will definitely visit again and recommend to others.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Poornima
Review: Very nice room and room service
Detailed Review: Highly recommended hotel, staffs were very friendly. We didn't know Hindi still they helped us out for transportation and other stuffs. Their cafe and restaurant is very good and nice food. Room service was excellent.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rawat
Detailed Review: The hotel was just awesome....the room was spacious, clean and had all amenities required....Price was reasonable....location was very good, close to new delhi railway station , market and good restaurant.....THE BEST THING I LIKED WAS THE COOPERATION, CORDIALITY AND WARMTH OF THE HOTEL STAFF...... Ll be Back again😊

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Nidhi P
Detailed Review: Old is gold , best service, best food, best big size room.value for money. Can add bakery products and liquor options and beer options. Also near Connaught Place and Pragati Maidan and Metro Station New Delhi railway station enough that’s enough

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: msga12
Detailed Review: This is our second stay at the Ajanta and again it was fabulous. We are an Australian family and love the way the staff go out of their way to ensure you are having the best possible time in Delhi. All of the staff from front of house to housekeeping are very friendly and are always happy to chat and give advise and recommendations for activities, sightseeing, restaurants etc. there is no hard sell just genuine customer service. We have stayed in three different rooms during our stays and on this occasion opted for a suite which was comfortable, spacious and beautifully air conditioned. Breakfast has many choices and is delicious, the restaurant staff are very attentive and always ensure you are well looked after. The hotel is in a vibrant area and is only a 5 minutes walk to New Delhi railway station and easy 20 walk to Connaught Place. Of course the hotel has transport options available including airport pick ups which was very convenient and very organized. Highly recommended!…

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: DIVYANSHU
Review: 7 years still..feels as new with excellent hospitality😊
Detailed Review: Superb experience from check in to check out with exceptional service, good food(good quality & quantity).. served by always smiling staff.. Reasons of me choosing this property; •most courteous staff •24 hour kitchen facility, •cleanliness and hygiene of the place, •Good WIFI •very good location near to nd rail. Station •every single room in this hotel is diff. tht gv diff vibe •Safe & secure feeling..  Special thanks to MAYA Mam (at front desk) who took care of all our needs..

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Suraj Gill
Detailed Review: Hotel Amax offers everything a traveller needs. The location is just a walk away from New Delhi Railway & Metro Stations. The rooms are neat and well-stocked with amenities. The staff are wonderfully astute and were able to help us with everything from directions for local attractions to inter-city train tickets. For a reasonably-priced round-the-clock service in a buzzing part of Delhi, no place is better than the Hotel Amax Inn. Would definitely come back!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Niall S
Review: Comfortable and reliable hotel in a good location
Detailed Review: Reliable and attentive staff, clean and basic rooms with en suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Our multiple stays at the Amax were comfortable and good value for money ( 2 travellers sharing a double room). The location in Paharganj is ideal if you plan to use the Indian Railway - it takes less than 10 minutes to walk to New Delhi Railway Station. Overall very happy with my time here. I would happily recommend it to a friend or fellow traveller!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Suraj Gill
Detailed Review: Hotel Amax offers everything a traveller needs. The location is just a walk away from New Delhi Railway & Metro Stations. The rooms are neat and well-stocked with amenities. The staff are wonderfully astute and were able to help us with everything from directions for local attractions to inter-city train tickets. For a reasonably-priced round-the-clock service in a buzzing part of Delhi, no place is better than the Hotel Amax Inn. Would definitely come back!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Niall S
Review: Comfortable and reliable hotel in a good location
Detailed Review: Reliable and attentive staff, clean and basic rooms with en suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Our multiple stays at the Amax were comfortable and good value for money ( 2 travellers sharing a double room). The location in Paharganj is ideal if you plan to use the Indian Railway - it takes less than 10 minutes to walk to New Delhi Railway Station. Overall very happy with my time here. I would happily recommend it to a friend or fellow traveller!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Suraj Gill
Detailed Review: Hotel Amax offers everything a traveller needs. The location is just a walk away from New Delhi Railway & Metro Stations. The rooms are neat and well-stocked with amenities. The staff are wonderfully astute and were able to help us with everything from directions for local attractions to inter-city train tickets. For a reasonably-priced round-the-clock service in a buzzing part of Delhi, no place is better than the Hotel Amax Inn. Would definitely come back!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Niall S
Review: Comfortable and reliable hotel in a good location
Detailed Review: Reliable and attentive staff, clean and basic rooms with en suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Our multiple stays at the Amax were comfortable and good value for money ( 2 travellers sharing a double room). The location in Paharganj is ideal if you plan to use the Indian Railway - it takes less than 10 minutes to walk to New Delhi Railway Station. Overall very happy with my time here. I would happily recommend it to a friend or fellow traveller!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Suraj Gill
Detailed Review: Hotel Amax offers everything a traveller needs. The location is just a walk away from New Delhi Railway & Metro Stations. The rooms are neat and well-stocked with amenities. The staff are wonderfully astute and were able to help us with everything from directions for local attractions to inter-city train tickets. For a reasonably-priced round-the-clock service in a buzzing part of Delhi, no place is better than the Hotel Amax Inn. Would definitely come back!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Niall S

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: amaru2018
Detailed Review: The area feels very unsafe, would not stay in this area again. Staff was okay but not too helpful. Room was okay but could be better maintained. Did not try the complementary breakfast so cannot speak on that.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Yuvi009
Detailed Review: The hospitality makes you feel at home. With a friendly staff and nice location, this place offers everything you need for a pleasant and comfortable stay.  ++Hotel have a parking area  good buffet breakfast  good conctivity WiFi !!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Masood Khan
Detailed Review: Room size was good and clean but wash room was pathetic and dirty no toiletries were there, no complimentary water bottles provided.. I had ordered food for dinner they sent me stinking rice and rest of food was ok... At the time of checked in I asked to give General Manager number with front office girl she had rebuked and said we are not authorized to give his number and she was very rude.  Front office staff should be very polite  and cooperative with smiling face.. However not recommended this hotel...value of money zero..

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mohammad S
Detailed Review: Staying with family for 5 days is very good staff behaviour is very good near to hotel many restaurants at good price Property is very neat and clean  We prefer always Hotel Amax inn new delhi  Pick up and drop to airport is very good and reasonable price Hapoy stay  Thanks for everything

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Will
Detailed Review: Bharat was great at organising our trip seamlessly. We were provided with an excellent driver, with great English and well experienced.  All hotels we stayed were a good quality. Bharat regularly checked in to see we were happy with the trip. The driver and trip were very flexible and enabled us to see sites we would have otherwise missed.  Overall very happy with his service.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Kanira1
Detailed Review: Located in small alley and walking distance from new delhi train station. Cheap ,neat & clean ! Staff is extreamly help full . I booked for 3 nights and airport pick up ( which is totally worth ) I reccomend to everyone and will defiantly stay there again !highly reccomended and value of the money !

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: jsbach_sg
Review: This is a place I'm likely to stay again and again
Detailed Review: I'm back after a hiatus. I stayed at Colonel's Retreat 1. This is a place I shall gladly make it my stay in Delhi whenever I'm there from now onwards.   The people are really kind and helpful. Esther is great. They are efficient and professional. The people are better than 5 star hotels. The rooms are great for me just like a home. I did have some technical issues but I will reach out to them privately for it's too minor to mention here; still deserve 5 star from me.   Okay, some hard truths. Airtel mobile network is weak there BUT use the Wifi in the premises for your Uber or OLA booking. The Wifi works great and I believe the establishment is aware of the mobile network issue which is out of their control but they constantly ensure their wifi is working. I hope when visitor number picks up and the premises is full house, their wifi continue to work fine. Incidentally, if you are a foreign visitor, you are less likely to get a local India mobile because it's a hassle to apply for one and your local contacts are likely to call you using WhatsApp so  you only need to get data roaming which is much more convenient.   So, I have just solved the 'communication' issue for the owner, I hope they will reward me the next time I'm there (just kidding).   Another point to note. This is NOT a hotel so it's not located right next to a mall or something like that. In my opinion, this place is for those who are familiar with Delhi. You need to book an Uber to move about and it's pretty much affordable as Defence Colony is quite near the city center. But be realistic about it, if you expect a conventional hotel, this is not for you but if you want a comfy home environement stay, this is it. Of course I must add their each of their room is tastefully decorated and better than hotel rooms in my opinion.…

The people are really kind and helpful. Esther is great. They are efficient and professional. The people are better than 5 star hotels. The rooms are great for me just like a home. I did have some technical issues but I will reach out to them privately for it's too minor to mention here; still deserve 5 star from me.   Okay, some hard truths. Airtel mobile network is weak there BUT use the Wifi in the premises for your Uber or OLA booking. The Wifi works great and I believe the establishment is aware of the mobile network issue which is out of their control but they constantly ensure their wifi is working. I hope when visitor number picks up and the premises is full house, their wifi continue to work fine. Incidentally, if you are a foreign visitor, you are less likely to get a local India mobile because it's a hassle to apply for one and your local contacts are likely to call you using WhatsApp so  you only need to get data roaming which is much more convenient.   So, I have just solved the 'communication' issue for the owner, I hope they will reward me the next time I'm there (just kidding).   Another point to note. This is NOT a hotel so it's not located right next to a mall or something like that. In my opinion, this place is for those who are familiar with Delhi. You need to book an Uber to move about and it's pretty much affordable as Defence Colony is quite near the city center. But be realistic about it, if you expect a conventional hotel, this is not for you but if you want a comfy home environement stay, this is it. Of course I must add their each of their room is tastefully decorated and better than hotel rooms in my opinion.…

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rayhan
Review: Central location and economically very good
Detailed Review: I say here for some day with family and we enjoyed our stay majority due to customer service provided by hotel staff , they help it out very quickly.they follow guideline regarding room cleaning .near to hotel many resturant at good price .thanks to hotel Amax inn for everything.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Shampad deb
Detailed Review: Overalls hotel rooms are good. The affordable price and management are very helpful. But some issues are needs to be fixed, suchlike a/c are not working properly and Wifi coverage are not good, have to inform them almost every time.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Nicolas
Detailed Review: Every time I come to Delhi, I choose this hotel to stay in. This place is run by people that is open to help and to take care of you, all the time. It's really recommendable that, if you're gonna stay in a place, you go to one that is friendly and filled with good people.  The location is very good, the AC works excellent, hot and cold water in bathrooms, big beds, perfect Wifi... And most important: it's very clean! Something that I miss in most of the hotels around here.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ahad
Detailed Review: amaze stay in hotel,  Staying with friends in Hotel  Amax inn. Near by Muslim restaurants at good price food.staff was really helpful.  We stay at hotel more then 40 days.most important thing is clean,  hygienic  and family hotel.thanks for everything.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Tom D
Review: Best place to stay in Delhi on a budget
Detailed Review: The Smyle Hotel provides good rooms with air conditioning, en suite facilities and affordable & nourishing room service options (complimentary breakfast included), all for a very reasonable price. Located just off one of New Delhi's main strips for good bars & restaurants, the location is ideal either as a base from which to see the city or as an overnight stay within a 5 minute walk of the main train station.  By far and away the best feature is the staff. The hospitality we received was excellent, with 24/7 care, and our hosts were amendable to a host of requests, from last minute extensions on our stay to sorting our laundry & shopping requirements (for hardly any profit). They have a license to navigate the complicated train system (almost impossible for foreign nationals to navigate) and essentially helped us to book trains, planes & cars for half of our month long trip around the country.   Couldn't recommend highly enough for anyone travelling the country.…

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mo C
Detailed Review: Smyle Inn is perfectly located in Old delhi, close to all facilities and the train station. The staff was really helpful all long and gave us super advice when arriving in Delhi.  Nice rooftop to rest after a busy day in the city

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: itchysole
Detailed Review: I have been staying here on every visit to Delhi for about 8 years now! I went back recently after a 2 year gap due to the pandemic.  It was a pleasure to see that, nothing has changed. All rooms are done up tastefully and maintained immaculately. Meals are always fabulous.   The staff is warm & super efficient. Victor & Kamlesh took great care of me this time (though I missed seeing Arvind & his cheerful smile).  Esther was kind enough to accommodate my last minute request to stay another night without having to  change rooms.  It was a delight to see the guard negotiate with a riksha driver to ensure that another guest who was just returning was not overcharged. When I’m here, I’ve never thought twice to worry about my belongings or any such thing.  I rely on the staff to find me a reliable cab service & driver if I expect to be out till late. This is truly home away from home!  Thank you Suman & Arun for opening up your beautiful home to us! Look forward to being back soon.…

When I’m here, I’ve never thought twice to worry about my belongings or any such thing.  I rely on the staff to find me a reliable cab service & driver if I expect to be out till late. This is truly home away from home!  Thank you Suman & Arun for opening up your beautiful home to us! Look forward to being back soon.…

Name: itchysole

It was a pleasure to see that, nothing has changed. All rooms are done up tastefully and maintained immaculately. Meals are always fabulous.   The staff is warm & super efficient. Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: neeraj c
Detailed Review: We booked a deluxe suite. The overall room sizes are good. All rooms are clean, well equipped with latest amenities and clean bathrooms as well. The corridors are bright and vibrant too which makes everything pleasant and makes you feel secured. Shops, market and station is very close by.   Cons: The staff should be more polite at times. They took a lot of time to complete our requests eg. Getting the complementary water bottles, setting up the extra bed.  There wasn't any room cleaning done on daily basis. They began cleaning as we were about to check out.   Breakfast menu was the same for both the days that we stayed.  All in all this is the best and safe hotel you will get in Pahadganj area, especially if you are traveling with family. Bear in mind that the cost is slightly on the higher side as compared to nearby hotels.  Tip: The complementary shuttle from airport is only offered for pick ups. So inform the hotel prior to your arrival if your booking entitles you one. We missed out on ours!!!…

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mostaqueahmedcatchmeifucan
Detailed Review: they were very helpful that everyone remember and obviously safe for every one, great thing that today we travel with Mr Manish on Sadar Bazar , Amaze experience.The owner of hotel help me lot for shopping at very good price , thanks

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: M khan@123the boss
Detailed Review: I stayed hotel Amax inn with my sister, good service  and Super clean room I got. Air-conditioning  working  very smooth.  They clean my room everyday  and changing  laundry .  Front desk is working  proper way, always  ready to help. I got a airport Pick up and drop service  from hotel,  it was very good. I recommend this place.  Thanks

Name: Lahiru S
Detailed Review: We stayed in this place for few nights ‘ and the room was nice and clean ‘ and the staff was very nice specially raj’ always helping us with all whatever we wanted and give us good information. And the manager was really nice guy too he speak good amount of English to understand everything what we need to know. Service excellent from all of the guys. We liked this place so much and special thanks for raj give us a special service. Good luck !

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Saba
Review: One of the safest and comfortable hotel....
Detailed Review: The hotel is on a walking distance from New Delhi Railway station (platform 1).  The host and the staff are humble...  I stayed with my family.... And will always try n stay in that hotel whenever I'll come to Delhi...

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Samprith S
Detailed Review: Ajanta Hotel In New delhi is Worst Hotel, Not Customer Friendly. Rooms Are Worst, Mattress  Are Below Single Star Hotel grade. if you Book For 2 Days Each Day They Will  Shift  You to  Different Rooms. Not The First Time in Last one Year 2 times it Happened to me. About Morning Breakfast  Waiter Will Take Orders as if they ARE SERVING FREE OF COST. NOT CUSTOMER FRIENDLY.........

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Parna R
Detailed Review: A highly recommended place. Location wise very convenient, spacious and clean rooms. It is an excellent value for money. I travelled from Europe, so I had to go through 7 days mandatory quarantine. Esther and her team (Victor, Suresh, Kamalesh and Abhimanyu) made sure my stay is comfortable. Home cooked food was available. Since I was not allowed to go out, Mr. Victor helped me to run some errands. I will definitely come back here.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: James H
Detailed Review: My travel companion and I stayed there 3 separate times before and after the New Year. Each time we booked a superior room. The first stay, the room was very nice and quiet, with a good, hot shower. The second time the room was far inferior, with only a window to the corridor, which only created more noise. The third stay was a little better, but the bathroom had a vented opening that could not be closed, even when it was cold and rainy. Not sure why we could never get the same room we had the first time, even though we requested it in advance. None of the rooms were as nice as though posted by the hotel. I had to double check that it was the same hotel because of how different the rooms looked. Food from the restaurant on site was pretty good and fresh omelettes were available…

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Shamim
Detailed Review: I stayed here with my wife and friends. Good place to stay. Nice room with very clean bathroom. Hot shower all the time. Staff always ready to help. Front desk working properly and in a good way. I used airport pick up and drop facility. Was very comfortable and safe Will come back soon Thanks everyone

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mamun
Detailed Review: I stayed in Hotel Amax Inn for five days with my friend  Mukit Miah. The rooms they have was perfect  and very comfortable.  I saw so many  families  from Bangladesh  staying  with them looks very happy.  Hot shower is ready  always.  Wifi in the rooms with Very good speed. Very clean rooms and bathrooms. Reception  people is always  ready to help in any need. I recommend  this place.  Love you  Amax team Will come back soon

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mukit
Detailed Review: Staying Hotel Amax Inn new Delhi is  really lucky for me, just stay two days and my work  done. Feel very happy. Staff was very helpful,  room neat and clean. Near by many Restaurant at good price.Round the Clock auto/ Taxi available.if i visit India,  defiantly staying in Amax inn.😊

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Masum ahmed
Detailed Review: Assalamu Alaikum I am Masum from Bangladesh, I am coming to Amax Inn Hotel 18th Hotel is picking me up from the airport by car, a very good service, good room, good use, the price is a little higher then everything is fine, everything is fine but internet Problem WiFi is a little too much problem, everything else is fine. If you want you can make a booking. The brother named Selim here is very helpful. He is helping in many ways.🥰

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rumej M
Detailed Review: I stay in hotel amax 6 nights with my wife it’s a very good hotel we spent a great time here rooms and bathrooms are very neat and clean hotel staff is very friendly and helpful and they have different categories of rooms with good price so I highly recommend this hotel to everyone who is looking for a budget hotel in pahar ganj area

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Niket Agarwal
Review: Stay away. Pathetic. Donate ur money to the poor rather.
Detailed Review: Pathetic. Just pathetic.  We were allotted two rooms on the fourth floor. The decor was more of like a dharamshala. The room was dirty. The towels were dirty. The toilet was stinking. The shower head was dirty.  Even when we raised the issue with the hotel staff they didnt seem to care.  We chose to stay here since we had stayed here before and didnt want to go through the hassle of selecting a new hotel.  This stay was so disappointing that we willl not stay here again.  The breakfast was also pathetic. The poori was unedible.  The staff also are useless.   Stay away.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: rumon a
Detailed Review: Over all I had a great experience staff was incredibly helpfull,and the amenities were great.the room was wonderful,clean and perfect .the hotel is middle of a muddy ,filthy area specially in rainy time.roomis cheap enough.would be great if they have their restaurant service open.hard to get a good restaurant for dine in around this hotel . behind the hotel there is a place who selling mouth watering biriany just loved it . everyone should try.recmmended for everyone who want to have a economy trip in delhi

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ekram ahmed
Detailed Review: I came delhi for some official work with my sister  i was looking for  a  good and budget  hotel one of my friend  recommed this Hotel  to me then i came to hotel Amax Inn.i stay 10 days in amax inn its very good hotel nice rooms clean bathrooms with wifi and they have many variety  of rooms of different  price range hotel staff wad very nice and helpful so i recommend  to hotel to other guest.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Monsur ahmed
Detailed Review: Best place for family stay. And very nice manner.  Very clean rooms and bathrooms.  Very clean and well maintained.  Thanks for their hospitality…😊  I recommend this hotel to my friends and other tourists also.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anusha
Detailed Review: The hotel is amazing.Very budget-friendly hotel with decent rooms and good breakfast spread. Amazing customer service from beginning to the end of the process  and the staff were very friendly and helpful.Enjoyed staying at Smyle Inn.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Md Ashiqul Islam
Detailed Review: Stayed at wing 1, very nice helpful staff, very good option for budget trip. Would be better If the room and toilet was bit more clean.overall very good to stay. Would recommend for people in budget. 😊

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mahir K
Detailed Review: We had a great experience with this hotel. It was clean, stuff was friendly and always ready to help. Rooms have AC and we also liked the location of the hotel. I would recommend this hotel to everyone!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Nadia
Detailed Review: We are very happy staying at Hotel Amax Inn , wonderful hotel with best price.Staff and owner very helpful , always trying to help in any ways.Room and bathroom proper clean everyday . Nice roof top with greenery , many plant .wonderful Stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anwar
Detailed Review: Fly from Bangladesh to Delhi on Covid 19 really tough but reaching Hotel  Amax inn,  feel very comfartable and relax,  we stayed approx 10 days.Staff are very helpful.Near to Hotel many  Restaurant at good price. You can get rickshaw and auto any time.The Area is Touristic place. Feel very comfortable with family.Thanks to Hotel  Amax inn staff.😊😊

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Haque
Detailed Review: We stay hotel amax inn more then 8 days,  feel very comfartable. Memorable time with family. Staff and owner very helpful. Neat and clean hotel with best price. We stayed in Family room.hygenic and Best.we recommended to our friend and family,  thanks.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Monisha
Review: Best place to stay in budget hotel
Detailed Review: Me and my 2 friends came delhi for embassy visa work we was 3 lady’s we was worrying about safety because we came 1 st time in Delhi but when we came to Amax inn hotel it’s very nice hotel and staff was very helpful . Rooms are very nice clean bathroom is very clean . Then we stay in hotel for 7 nights . Whenever I will come delhi I would like to stay in Amax Inn hotel it’s like our 2 nd home in Delhi.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Bahar M
Detailed Review: I visit Delhi with my family I was looking a hotel to stay in Delhi , my friend recommended this hotel .we r very happy, all staff and owner very co operative, always trying to help.Reception man very good .I recommend this hotel to my friend and relative .due to covid 19 , we scared but after reaching hotel ,feel very safe.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Lutfar
Detailed Review: I StayHotel Amax inn new delhi with family,  all things go good from starting till end.Pick up from Airport and most important is Room and hygenic all superab.the price is very good as compare to budget  hotel.  The staff always help. The room cleaning staff is also very good.the resturant near was good.Auto and taxi 24 hours.They response very well as what's app and  mail,  thanks for everything. 😊

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rasel
Detailed Review: As this pandemic situation due to Covid 19,  we have to go New delhi with family,  searching for good hotel at best price,  my friend recommend us Hotel Amax Inn. We feel very good after reaching,  we got Pick up service from Airport and also nice room. Staff very humble,  evertime trying to help us.so just great.

Name: Michael

Name: Ismarika Basnet
Detailed Review: This is one of the most friendly and helpful hotel of pahargunj,new Delhi.It has one of the best staffs to stay with,the servicing and cleaning are out of this world.You can call them any time and they will be available for your business.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sudip G
Detailed Review: I am from nepal  been there on last of July. Hotel room is good . Staff are so friendly & helpful especially ravi. Hotel is so clean, bathrooms, breakfast is tasty but only limited items they offered, overall hotel  is good I highly recommend to stay there.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: dipkamal
Detailed Review: I spent 4 days and nights at this place and I loved it. The place is affordable, clean and staff are friendly. They even served breakfast included with the nominal price of rent. Will surely visit again :)

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Maharjan
Detailed Review: The rooms are nice and big. The staff are very helpful and the environment in the hotel feels like home. The rooms are available as per price so you can get rooms in cheaper price as well if you are willing to stay in a smaller room.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sujan
Detailed Review: Every thing is good. Found Ravi is very helpful in managing things. Would have been more better if hotel has restaurant service as well. Room size was good, clean with all the required equipments. I recommend this hotel if you are searching affordable and good hotel in town.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: tipis85
Detailed Review: I had the most relaxing and comfortable stay at colonels. It is spotlessly clean, with a lovely work desk next to the window. i had requested for a room with plenty sunlight and was very satisfied with what was given. i ate most of my dinners at the retreat and it was sumptuous and fresh. while all of this made my stay easy, the staff was so nice , eager to help and non interfering- it just made the pace home. They always maintained safe distance and wore a mask. After a heavy days work and given the pandemic and all its uncertainties  , i looked forward each day to going back to my room to relax.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Departure588055
Detailed Review: I stayed at Amax for about 7-months during the covid lockdown so I got the know it and its people very well. The room is comfortable and large. The location is excellent because it's central and near to local markets. During lockdown I bought fruit from the local market which was close; I enjoyed the ambience and merchants alot. The owners, managers and staff are fun, helpful and friendly. It's a really nice place to stay. It must be because I keep coming back here year after year.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: scottday
Detailed Review: Got caught in Covid lockdown while staying with the fine people at Hotel Amax Inn. They have stayed open and safely conscious throughout the pandemic. They have gone above and beyond for their guests, simply amazing hospitality at a difficult time. Don’t hesitate to stay here, it’s truly a professionally run hotel. I can’t recommend them enough, they will surely take care of you like family. I’ve been staying here on and off for many years and the quality remains top notch.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: scottday
Detailed Review: Got caught in Covid lockdown while staying with the fine people at Hotel Amax Inn. They have stayed open and safely conscious throughout the pandemic. Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: HappytravellerWilts
Detailed Review: We can’t recommend The Colonel’s Retreat highly enough. It is excellent value for money, but so much more than that. Suman and her team were so attentive to our every need and went out of their way to be helpful. Our stay was just as the COVID 19 epidemic was gathering pace and the hotel was a place of calm and safety away from the mayhem. It is scrupulously clean, with cool and spacious communal indoor lounges as well as a lovely roof terrace. Delicious and interesting food with great explanations of what’s on the plate.   This is an outstandingly organised gem of a place and I wish them continued success for the future!

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: TraceyNZ2015
Detailed Review: We booked to have two overnight stays at Colonels Retreat - one at the beginning of our 10days in Northern India and again at the end, as we entered and exited via Delhi's Indira Gandhi International Airport. But - due to the COVID pandemic and the unfolding International situation our stay became considerably longer.  We were privileged to meet Col. Khanna on our first morning in India, a treat not always available as he no longer manages the Retreat himself, but one we all cherished as he talked about his love of cricket,his travels and his special incites into Delhi, a city he is passionately fond of.  A chat casually held over a wonderful, traditional, India Breakfast on the rooftop balcony. The retreat is situated in a lovely, upmarket, area of Delhi, conveniently close to Markets, restaurants and the metro. The rooms are spacious, cool and extremely clean. Communal dining and lounges on each floor encourage socialisation with other travelers, but if you prefer they also offer quiet spaces to read, write and contemplate the incredible experiences you will have had out sightseeing. High Tea is offered free of charge every afternoon, if the weather allows on the rooftop, otherwise in the upper lounge - Suman's chocolate cakes, like her banana bread, are truly scrumptious. The evening meal,ordered a minimum of an hour before you wish to dine, offers a good selection of tasty, fresh, home made curries and accompaniments - the price is reasonable and the service fantastic. If you are lucky enough to dine on the rooftop, keep on eye out for the nightly migration of fruit bats! Suman and Arun make a personal effort to chat with their guests, offering sightseeing ideas, and tips for getting the most out of a city and country they are very passionate about. Our, unexpected, extended stay at Colonels Retreat was a bonus of the evolving crisis we found ourselves in, and we can not thank enough all the staff at the Retreat for the support, advise and shelter they gave us at a truly challenging time. We will be back and we will stay at Colonels Retreat! Namaste…

Name: Johnadh
Detailed Review: We stayed two night at the Colonels Retreat. Comfortable rooms, good service and excellent food served on the roof top terrace. Good breakfast served with the ever present banana bread. The area is nice and quiet away from the hustle and bustle of New Delhi.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Larainenash
Detailed Review: We stayed in this homestay in Delhi, for one night and wished it had been longer.  Our room was large, clean, with king size bed and en suite shower bathroom. The roof terrace was a delight to have your meals or drinks on.  All meals were exceptionally tasty with large portions and of a high standard. The Tandoori Chicken is a must.  All served with a good selection of wine and beer.  A free afternoon tea with banana cake was provided and a very welcome treat after a days sightseeing. The breakfast we found of a high standard also and included cereals, fruit, yoghurt, eggs cooked fresh to your liking, with toast and jams.   The location was perfect to see the sights of old and New Delhi.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  All in all we would highly recommend this place…

Suman and her team were so attentive to our every need and went out of their way to be helpful. Our stay was just as the COVID 19 epidemic was gathering pace and the hotel was a place of calm and safety away from the mayhem. It is scrupulously clean, with cool and spacious communal indoor lounges as well as a lovely roof terrace. Delicious and interesting food with great explanations of what’s on the plate.   This is an outstandingly organised gem of a place and I wish them continued success for the future!

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: TraceyNZ2015
Detailed Review: We booked to have two overnight stays at Colonels Retreat - one at the beginning of our 10days in Northern India and again at the end, as we entered and exited via Delhi's Indira Gandhi International Airport. But - due to the COVID pandemic and the unfolding International situation our stay became considerably longer.  We were privileged to meet Col. Khanna on our first morning in India, a treat not always available as he no longer manages the Retreat himself, but one we all cherished as he talked about his love of cricket,his travels and his special incites into Delhi, a city he is passionately fond of.  A chat casually held over a wonderful, traditional, India Breakfast on the rooftop balcony. The retreat is situated in a lovely, upmarket, area of Delhi, conveniently close to Markets, restaurants and the metro. The rooms are spacious, cool and extremely clean. Communal dining and lounges on each floor encourage socialisation with other travelers, but if you prefer they also offer quiet spaces to read, write and contemplate the incredible experiences you will have had out sightseeing. High Tea is offered free of charge every afternoon, if the weather allows on the rooftop, otherwise in the upper lounge - Suman's chocolate cakes, like her banana bread, are truly scrumptious. The evening meal,ordered a minimum of an hour before you wish to dine, offers a good selection of tasty, fresh, home made curries and accompaniments - the price is reasonable and the service fantastic. If you are lucky enough to dine on the rooftop, keep on eye out for the nightly migration of fruit bats! Suman and Arun make a personal effort to chat with their guests, offering sightseeing ideas, and tips for getting the most out of a city and country they are very passionate about. Our, unexpected, extended stay at Colonels Retreat was a bonus of the evolving crisis we found ourselves in, and we can not thank enough all the staff at the Retreat for the support, advise and shelter they gave us at a truly challenging time. We will be back and we will stay at Colonels Retreat! Namaste…

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Cilla T
Detailed Review: We stayed here a few days before returning home because of the Corona Virus. The owner made us feel personally welcome. With your lovely decoration touches.The rooms and sitting areas were very comfortable. We had WiFi and bottle water supplied in big containers to fill your empties, good for the environment. The terrace on the roof was a comfortable place to eat and drink. The owner took time to explain what we were ordering and was happy to advise. The roof terrace was very pretty. We felt safe walking out to the ATM and comfortable using the Colonels Retreat as a base. Thank you for your hospitality via Trailfinders. From Mr and Mrs Trusler & friends.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Gillian Terry
Review: An oasis in the middle of Delhi
Detailed Review: Colonel's Retreat is like an oasis in the middle of Delhi.    The roof top restaurant is unexpected and pretty, the food delicious, our room was very comfy - and the owners and the staff are so very friendly and helpful.      Colonel's Retreat is in a residential area and thus very quiet - and it's very safe to go for a walk to the nearby parks.   We didn't expect this in Delhi.     We wish we'd found Colonel's Retreat years ago on our previous visits to Delhi. We've been to Delhi many times over the years and stayed in very disappointing larger (and expensive) hotels and almost dreaded having to stay in Delhi.     We wished we could have stayed longer.   We'll be back as soon as we can!

We felt safe walking out to the ATM and comfortable using the Colonels Retreat as a base. Thank you for your hospitality via Trailfinders. From Mr and Mrs Trusler & friends.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Gillian Terry
Review: An oasis in the middle of Delhi
Detailed Review: Colonel's Retreat is like an oasis in the middle of Delhi.    The roof top restaurant is unexpected and pretty, the food delicious, our room was very comfy - and the owners and the staff are so very friendly and helpful.      Colonel's Retreat is in a residential area and thus very quiet - and it's very safe to go for a walk to the nearby parks.   We didn't expect this in Delhi.     We wish we'd found Colonel's Retreat years ago on our previous visits to Delhi. We've been to Delhi many times over the years and stayed in very disappointing larger (and expensive) hotels and almost dreaded having to stay in Delhi.     We wished we could have stayed longer.   We'll be back as soon as we can!

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: HappytravellerWilts
Detailed Review: We can’t recommend The Colonel’s Retreat highly enough. It is excellent value for money, but so much more than that. Suman and her team were so attentive to our every need and went out of their way to be helpful. Our stay was just as the COVID 19 epidemic was gathering pace and the hotel was a place of calm and safety away from the mayhem. It is scrupulously clean, with cool and spacious communal indoor lounges as well as a lovely roof terrace. Delicious and interesting food with great explanations of what’s on the plate.   This is an outstandingly organised gem of a place and I wish them continued success for the future!

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: TraceyNZ2015
Detailed Review: We booked to have two overnight stays at Colonels Retreat - one at the beginning of our 10days in Northern India and again at the end, as we entered and exited via Delhi's Indira Gandhi International Airport. But - due to the COVID pandemic and the unfolding International situation our stay became considerably longer.  We were privileged to meet Col. Khanna on our first morning in India, a treat not always available as he no longer manages the Retreat himself, but one we all cherished as he talked about his love of cricket,his travels and his special incites into Delhi, a city he is passionately fond of.  A chat casually held over a wonderful, traditional, India Breakfast on the rooftop balcony. The retreat is situated in a lovely, upmarket, area of Delhi, conveniently close to Markets, restaurants and the metro. The rooms are spacious, cool and extremely clean. Communal dining and lounges on each floor encourage socialisation with other travelers, but if you prefer they also offer quiet spaces to read, write and contemplate the incredible experiences you will have had out sightseeing. High Tea is offered free of charge every afternoon, if the weather allows on the rooftop, otherwise in the upper lounge - Suman's chocolate cakes, like her banana bread, are truly scrumptious. The evening meal,ordered a minimum of an hour before you wish to dine, offers a good selection of tasty, fresh, home made curries and accompaniments - the price is reasonable and the service fantastic. If you are lucky enough to dine on the rooftop, keep on eye out for the nightly migration of fruit bats! Suman and Arun make a personal effort to chat with their guests, offering sightseeing ideas, and tips for getting the most out of a city and country they are very passionate about. Our, unexpected, extended stay at Colonels Retreat was a bonus of the evolving crisis we found ourselves in, and we can not thank enough all the staff at the Retreat for the support, advise and shelter they gave us at a truly challenging time. We will be back and we will stay at Colonels Retreat! Namaste…

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Cilla T
Detailed Review: We stayed here a few days before returning home because of the Corona Virus. The owner made us feel personally welcome. With your lovely decoration touches.The rooms and sitting areas were very comfortable. We had WiFi and bottle water supplied in big containers to fill your empties, good for the environment. The terrace on the roof was a comfortable place to eat and drink. The owner took time to explain what we were ordering and was happy to advise. The roof terrace was very pretty. We felt safe walking out to the ATM and comfortable using the Colonels Retreat as a base. Thank you for your hospitality via Trailfinders. From Mr and Mrs Trusler & friends.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Gillian Terry
Review: An oasis in the middle of Delhi
Detailed Review: Colonel's Retreat is like an oasis in the middle of Delhi.    The roof top restaurant is unexpected and pretty, the food delicious, our room was very comfy - and the owners and the staff are so very friendly and helpful.      Colonel's Retreat is in a residential area and thus very quiet - and it's very safe to go for a walk to the nearby parks.   We didn't expect this in Delhi.     We wish we'd found Colonel's Retreat years ago on our previous visits to Delhi. We've been to Delhi many times over the years and stayed in very disappointing larger (and expensive) hotels and almost dreaded having to stay in Delhi.     We wished we could have stayed longer.   We'll be back as soon as we can!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: chandan
Review: Please do not go by the view as shown in the picture
Detailed Review: Please do not go by the picture shown in this. The rooms are small and you can listen to sound of people moving across your room, There is no privacy or such. The bathroom is also tacky. Complaint for hot water but it was not available. You will not find the picture shown for rooms.You can find better hotel at this price. Price for rooms cannot be more the Rs. 1000. The restaurant is too heavily priced and the food is not even at par with the price.  For some one Staying there. You can have a great simple food at Rs. 80.Please take a left after coming out of the  hotel. After moving about 50 meter on the right hand side you will find a hotel.  " Pure Veg Food". It is also written in bengali.  We Travel to Agra, Mathura Vrindavan by Innova Crytsa. We paid 7000( inclusive Toll +…

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Adrian Z
Review: Great hotel, save and clean with EXCELLENT SERVICE!!!
Detailed Review: Our stay at Hotel Ajanta was amazing, especially the service was really extraordinary! Hotel manager Zahoor Baktoo, a kind and generous man, helped with everything, literally with everything we could possibly need. We were treated like family and he said "when you are here in India, you are one of us!".   For me and my partner it was the first trip to the country, diving directly into the vibrant heart of New Delhi, an adventure from the start. On our very first day we were almost getting scammed (by a guy on the street who worked with a TukTuk driver, who drove us to a fake travel agency), which can happen on a daily bases, but Zahoor was somehow aware of that scamming attempt (which happened 300m away from the hotel) and warned us, prevented bad things happening to us.  He…

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ticharley
Review: Reasonable hotel unfortunately in unsafe part of Delhi
Detailed Review: Solo white middle aged female travelling around India for one month. The hotel was comfortable and clean with friendly staff however the area it is situated in is frantic and I was stopped on 3 seperate occasions on different days by kind English speaking men telling me not to walk around this area alone as I was very unsafe due to being white, female and alone.  This energy was also felt by myself as I was walking around so I took tuk tuk to other areas that felt safer.  I had not felt this way in any other area of India that I had solo travelled during my month there - quite the opposite vibe everywhere else.  Will not stay in this area of Delhi again even if I was with someone else.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: hotelreview123
Detailed Review: Stayed in a deluxe room - pretty basic and poor even by Indian standards. Location quite good but make sure you know the correct location as the booking sites and google maps have different locations for the Amax Inn! Ok if your out all day and get it cheap. They seem to have 2 little blocks one on each side of the alleyway/narrow road. The annex bloack didnt even have any security, just an unmanned desk and a couple off CCTV cameras!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: hotelreview123
Detailed Review: Stayed in a deluxe room - pretty basic and poor even by Indian standards. Location quite good but make sure you know the correct location as the booking sites and google maps have different locations for the Amax Inn! Ok if your out all day and get it cheap. They seem to have 2 little blocks one on each side of the alleyway/narrow road. The annex bloack didnt even have any security, just an unmanned desk and a couple off CCTV cameras!

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rodrigo
Review: Very good hostel and nice location!
Detailed Review: I would like to recommend you all , this nice Hostel! It's located in Main Bazar, Paharganj, but in a Side street which is more quiet and silent. The place is good for stay a few days and specially the people there are very kindly. Attention is excellent, they gave me a Map, and explained me how to move around Delhi. The service was really good for me. Thanks for all and hope to come there again !

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jonathan C
Detailed Review: This wasn’t your regular hotel tourist stay... although the room was quite nice and comfy, and close to all nearby popular spots in Delhi. I stayed here during the first few days of the coronavirus lockdown in Delhi... and the hotel staff was exceptional at alleviating any problems I faced such as getting food. They took extra care to clean and sanitize the rooms and hands, and offered meals throughout the day as well for a very reasonable price (at a time where you couldn’t find food anywhere). This was a safe place for me to be while I waited for a rescue flight back home. Thank you for all your efforts, and I hope to stay here again in the future under better circumstances! Be well and safe.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Margaret L
Detailed Review: A good basic hotel with friendly staff, clean rooms and handy services for travelers. They offered sightseeing at reasonable prices, and were helpful with local sim cards. We felt taken care of and were happy to have it as our home base off the Main Bazaar.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Adele M
Detailed Review: Clean hotel with excellent friendly helpful staff.  Very basic but if your only planning on sleeping here it’s ideal. You can book trips, taxis and change money all within the hotel. I was here with my husband and it was fine but I think I wouldn’t have wanted to stay here if I was on my own or with a group of girls as it’s up an alley. Can be noisy till around 11pm with horns rooting and dogs barking but after that it settles. Definitely worth the money.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rodrigo
Detailed Review: I would like to recommend you all , this nice Hostel! It's located in Main Bazar, Paharganj, but in a Side street which is more quiet and silent. The place is good for stay a few days and specially the people there are very kindly. Attention is excellent, they gave me a Map, and explained me how to move around Delhi. The service was really good for me. Thanks for all and hope to come there again !
